tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Tests,Caesarean Section (C Section),Pregnancy Scan,
review:
We are overjoyed to share that our beautiful baby girl was born on 28th May 2024, and we owe so much of our happiness to Dr. Aparnaa. From the very beginning of my wife’s pregnancy, Dr. Aparnaa has been a beacon of support, guidance, and care.

Consulting Dr. Aparnaa at her clinic was one of the best decisions we made. Throughout the entire pregnancy journey, she was incredibly polite and supportive, always treating my wife like a family member. Her compassionate approach and attentive care made us feel reassured and confident at every stage.

Dr. Aparnaa ensured that all checkups were done promptly and prescribed necessary medications when needed. She patiently listened to all our concerns and took the time to explain everything in detail, which we deeply appreciated.

Her clinic is very well managed, and we never felt rushed during our appointments. She provided ample time for each patient, making us feel valued and heard. Additionally, her availability on WhatsApp for any urgent queries was a tremendous support.

The delivery at Rainbow Hospital was seamless, thanks to Dr. Aparnaa. Her expertise and calm demeanor during the delivery process were truly commendable.

We highly recommend Dr. Aparnaa to anyone seeking a gynecologist who combines professionalism with a personal touch. Our journey was made significantly smoother and more enjoyable because of her exceptional care. Thank you, Dr. Aparnaa, for everything!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
As new parents, my partner and I embarked on the thrilling yet daunting journey of welcoming a newborn into our lives. Amidst the flurry of emotions and uncertainties, we were fortunate to find ourselves under the care of Dr. Aparnaa Panda, a true miracle worker in every sense.

From our very first consultation, Dr. Panda exuded warmth, professionalism, and expertise. She didn't just see us as patients; she saw us as individuals with hopes, dreams, and anxieties about parenthood. Dr. Panda's ability to empathise and connect with us on a personal level instantly put us at ease, making what could have been an overwhelming experience feel manageable and even joyful.

Throughout the pregnancy, Dr. Panda's guidance was invaluable. She took the time to address our concerns, patiently explaining each step of the journey and alleviating any fears we had along the way. Her reassuring presence during prenatal appointments provided us with the confidence we needed to navigate this new chapter of our lives.

When the day finally arrived for our little one to make their grand entrance into the world, Dr. Panda's expertise shone brilliantly. Her calm demeanour and unwavering support during labor and delivery were nothing short of extraordinary. Despite the inevitable challenges that arose, Dr. Panda remained a steady beacon of hope and encouragement, guiding us through each moment with grace and skill.

Thanks to Dr. Panda's dedication and expertise, we welcomed our precious baby into the world with overwhelming gratitude and joy. Her unwavering commitment to our well-being, both physically and emotionally, left an indelible mark on our lives.

We are eternally grateful for her exceptional care and unwavering support during this incredible journey into parenthood. If you are seeking compassionate, expert care for your pregnancy and childbirth journey, look no further than Dr. Aparnaa Panda. *** ** ****** *** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I recently delivered a healthy baby vaginally under the careful care of Dr. Aparna Panda. She was very supportive and guided me every step of my pregnancy. She always answered questions I had and listened carefully to whatever I had to say. During delivery I did have certain issues like the cord around the baby's neck and also the baby's pulse began dropping, yet she took great care and helped me deliver normally. She made sure I was comfortable and was with me in the labour room all through the way. I am very grateful to have found such a wonderful doctor to help me with my pregnancy and birth.

review: Dr. Aparna has become like our family doctor. She handled the deliveries for my two sisters and my wife, resulting in four normal deliveries, just as we wanted. In a time when many doctors prefer to opt for cesarean sections, Dr. Aparna respects and understands patient wishes for normal deliveries. I highly recommend her for any delivery-related issues, especially if you are seeking a normal delivery.

tags: Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I believe doctor's need to give the justification of package fees which they are charging. They asked for 10k under which they just provide Rs. 300-350 medicine and provide Rs. 1800*2 ultrasound & Rs. 600*3 consulting fee that's it. * ******* ** ******** ****** ******* *** ******* *** *** *** *********** *** ******* ******* ** *** ******** ***** ******* ***** ** ***** *** * **** **** *** ****** ** **** ******* **** **** **** ***** 

If we are taking these service separately it cost approx. 6k then why do we need to take the package of 10k for getting those services which can get at 50% lower price. Do think and take the decision thereafter.

* ******** ** ******* **** ** *** ** *** *** **** *** **** *** *** ** ******* ******** **** ******** *** *** **** ******* ******** ****** ** ******* **** *** ********** can take the decision smartly.

So, before going directly and paying the fee, take time and make a smart decision.

 For us she is a lifesaver, will always be grateful to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
"Hope to Real"

We meet Dr. Aparna Panda after we lost our hope (miscarriage). Me and my wife were totally depressed after the miscarriage. We didn't even knew what to do next.

We searched in Google for best Gynecologist near by and then we found Dr. Aparna Panda. On our first meet we felt relaxed after consulting with her , she explained exactly why miscarriage happened and what can be done next. Soon after talking to her, me and my wife felt very relaxed and hopeful.
She suggested some medication and asked us to visit after 2 weeks.

After 2 weeks,
My wife recovered but still she was under depression. We visited her clinic and we consulted what can be done next.
She with calm and cool mind replied us not to worry at all and she will guide us from then. We did spend a good amount of time with her and she guided us with a proper and very accurate timeline.

She advised my wife to undergo medication for hormone imbalance (which caused the miscarriage) after some tests and she gave us a strict timeline of the treatment.
But the main challenge was I had to travel abroad for 3months for urgent replace of my colleague.I was tensed because she was alone here and also for the huge loss.
Dr. Aparna Panda made sure and took a great care of my wife during her treatment period during my absence.

My wife starting feeling good , hopeful and relaxed after every meet with the doctor. She took care of my wife like her own family member. Even though I was not here she treated my wife very well and advised her what to do and what not to do.

But we had a fear in our mind that it takes long time duration to get conceived after first miscarriage and we didn't knew when we are going to be blessed.
I returned back and we meet doctor and she said everything is normal now, she waved green signal for planning.

After 2months, when we tested it was a different feeling for us. Yes it was good news and we were so happy we couldn't believe.
We meet doctor in evening and she also confirmed, that day was the most happiest day of our life.
Dr Aparna Panda treatment really has magical power and the timeline what she gave was perfect.
She recommends only necessary tests and medication.

Then She asked my wife to follow some protocols and advised many things to get things very smooth. My wife followed every word of her.
After 6th week,during scan we heard the heart beat of our baby and tears of joy in our eyes. We were so happy we couldn't still believe and then we informed our closed ones.

Times passed on and everything went very smooth. After nine months of journey we were blessed with a baby boy..through normal delivery.
Dr Aparna Pandas patience during normal delivery is really respectable. She has very good patience.

We are really very thankful to Dr Aparna Panda for treating us and taking care like member's of her family.
She turned our Hope into Real so soon , we didn't even felt that something bad had happened earlier with us.

For Dr. Aparna Panda from my wife.
"Nine months of my pregnancy could have been a nightmare without your medical supervision. Thanks for making my journey to become a mommy nothing less than a dream come true."


Thank you so much Mam,

Bishnupriya and Raj Kumar
reply_text:
Thanks for the detailed feedback. 
Yes, yours was a complicated case but was easy to treat once the diagnosis was made. The blood tests were costly but because you agreed to do them, it saved a lot of heartache later on. 
Normal delivery was possible only because was your wife was extremely cooperative.
My love to our little Janardhan.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I checked Dr.Aparna's profile in practo and was very much impressed by her positive reviews on normal delivery. So, we decided to consult her for pregnancy check ups, we were happy about the covid safety measures taken in her clinic.I had my own birth plan like breastfeeding in the 1st one hr, delayed cord clamping and skin to skin. Dr.Aparna agreed to all of it and I was totally satisfied when she mentioned that she practices all of it. So, we convinced our parents to have the delivery in Bangalore itself instead of our native.The pregnancy went on really smooth, did walking, squatting, yoga and was active throughout the pregnancy,ensured not to gain more weight. Doctor also promised 99% for normal delivery inspite of the low water level. She suggested us to admit in Rainbow hospital in my 37th week as the baby was in Cephalic position and 2.9 kgs of weight. I was induced on Jan 25th around 8 pm, I started getting contractions but I did not dilate. Still the doctor in the ward told we will try for normal delivery till 26th Jan 12 noon if the fetal heart rate is stable. From midnight my contractions were intense, but I dilated only 3 cm by 26th Jan around 9.30 AM. Baby was distressed by then, the fetal heart rate was going down.Dr.Aparna suggested us to go for C- section, in less then 10 mins they shifted me to the operation theater. She had a wonderful team in Rainbow children's hospital, Bannerghatta road they swiftly made all the arrangements and I delivered  a boy baby on 26th Jan, 10.19 AM.Baby was distressed, he had mild respiratory issue. He was shifted to NICU immediately, the doctors in the NICU took the necessary care. He was shifted to the ward in 30 hrs and we got discharged on 28th Jan. My sincere thanks to the doctors and the staffs in NICU for the treatment and care provided. Service provided at Rainbow hospital was impressive. Due to covid only my husband was allowed with me and this being our first pregnancy, things went on smooth because of kindness and support of the nurses in the ward throughout our stay.My sincere gratitude to Dr.Aparna for extending her support during my pregnancy and postpartum.  She was always available in watsapp to support. She is extremely professional, *** **** *** ********* *********** ********* ** ***** *** will not panic you at any time. Though things did not go as per my birth plan, she did her best for the healthy mother and baby. Special thanks for recommending Rainbow children's hospital, we were extremely happy about the service provided.
reply_text: Thankyou very much for detailing all your experiences and expectations with us.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Here my journey starts with Dr.Aparna ma'am.
When I googled about her I found very positive reviews about normal deliy.I also read different opinions about her but I strongly recommend her name and I will tell you the reason why.
So first of all I am Dr.Renu a physiotherapist. I had to go through a phase of miscarriage in my first conception and I was very sad and worried thinking what will happen in my  second time conception.When I came to know about Dr.Aparna I decided to meet her in my 2nd month . Though I was hesitant when I met her for the first time because she didn't explain me in detail. But when I went for second visit she explained to me everything about my pregnancy and then on things started to look very nice and smooth.I started to gain trust on her.Suddenly 6th month and onwards my pregnancy had some complications like Gestational diabetes,Cholestasis jaundice,severe itching,my haemoglobin was also very low and on top of these I was overweight. Since I am from medical background I could understand these problems and tried to take care of these as per doctor's guidance.Because of my complications doctor said she will do induced labour on 37th week and try for normal delivery.But until you see your baby out and everything is fine you don't really accept everything what doctor says.I was scared and worried.Finally the day came when I had to undergo induced labour. I got admitted in Rainbow hospital, nurses started to give medicines to induced pain but my pain and dilatation was not progressing as expected till next morning.Then doctor quickly decide to break the water and checked how much i had progressed. After that my pain started to progress. I was coping up with pain by doing gentle breathing exercises. When my pain become high I started getting tired. My doctor had suggested me for epidural but I wasn't ready for it and said i will bear the pain. Being a physiotherapist I was aware of side effects of  epidural and wanted to avoid it. As my pain was progressing further I was becoming very tired and started to think if this continues I will lack with energy and won't be able to deliver normally and then I quickly decided to take epidural. By this time I had dilated only 4cm.
Now my epidural procedure went very smooth and experienced no pain after that and dilatation was progressing. After that I delivered normally.
Dr.Aparna handled my case very well. I was really amazed by her experience of handling the situation and taking quick decisions. At that moment I really felt blessed to be having my baby under her hands..I cannot thank her enough for what she did for us...I highly recommend Dr.Aparna ma'am especially to those who are looking for normal delivery in Bangalore.
After taking epidural and having painless normal delivery I strongly recommend to take epidural and enjoy painless delivery because I feel it's a blessing for people like us who do not want to take labour pain and still have smooth normal delivery.
Nowadays normal delivery is becoming a rare thing and when we get to know someone have normal delivery we feel very happy. And same happened to me. I am blessed with a baby girl weighing 2.9 kg and all because of ma'am.
Thank you so much ma'am for taking such a good care of my pregnancy..
Thanks a lot.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Painful Periods,Heavy Periods,PCOD/PCOS Treatment,Pregnant,Infertility in Women,
review: 3 weeks agoI've waited too long to give this review.My relationship with Dr.Aparnaa mam began way back in March 2018 when I visited her for heavy menstruation flow and pain and with a single scan I was diagnosed with PCOS in one of my ovaries. Mam had a clear conversation with me regarding my family planning and suggested I should hold on for sometime and get treated for PCOS first so that I can conceive naturally. 6 months of treatment and I was ready to conceive. However, due to personal commitments, I had discontinued medication and consultation for a few months and tried conceiving on my own. After 3 failed attempts,I went back to Aparnaa mam for help. She immediately recognized me and had a hard talk regarding my discontinuity of medication. However, I was determined this time and with mam's help I was able to conceive within a month. My pregnancy journey has been super smooth. I was lucky enough to not have any complications and those 9 months have been the most amazing months of my life so far. I was due on April 29th and the Covid 19 situation was really getting into my nerves. On my end term scan, doctor told me that baby was in a position for normal delivery.But I was so paranoid with the lockdown situation and post recovery stories from my friends about normal delivery that I didn't want to get into any kind of emergency situation and requested mam for a planned c section. Aparnaa mam tried to explain me that every body is different and it's not necessary that I would go through the same things that my friends experienced. She was determined to have my mind set into normal delivery and she assured nothing would go wrong. As fate would have it, my water broke 2 days later , i.e on 4th April and I got admitted to Rainbow hospital immediately. Aparnaa mam visited me in the evening and explained that I had to be induced as I had not gone into labour yet. She was courteous enough to ask me if I want to get induced or go for c section. I opted to follow what she feels is right for me. 15 hours into labour but my baby was in no mood to come out 😊. Finally had to go for c section at 10am on 5th April and got blessed with a baby boy. Post operation recovery was very quick and it felt like breeze. We are so happy to have our bundle of joy finally *** ******* *** *** **** * ***** ****** ********** *** ******** We thank Mam for being with us and help us make our family complete. Highlighting a few positives :* Very professional and learned doctor* Well maintained clinic and supportive staff* **** *** ********* ******** ********** Always available for help* Doctor will be hard on u if needed, but that's for ur good* C section felt like a minor surgery with very fast revovery*Highly recommend for any kind of OB consultation
reply_text: Very happy to know that I made a positive difference in your family way.

tags: None
review:
High Risk Pregnancy 

First time I met her was Oct 2016. I went to her adamantly wanting a cervical stitch due to a previous los. But she suggested against it and instead advised other non invasive and natural methods during pregnancy. Instead of advising us to just getting preg she asked us to do certain tests to eliminate all possibilities, advising me to fix all my dental problem, losing weight, etc etc. During my entire pregnancy she watched over my diet, my weight , my bp, my fibroids and such other factors like a hawk. She monitored me very very closely. She never ignored even the smallest factor. I knew my preg was a hard one due to my late age, overweight, multiple fibroids, previous los, tendency of G.D, bp, etc. So she put me on strict bed rest and diet. My entire preg I never put on weight, I remained the same thru entire preg. With her guidance and advice I had one of the most normal smooth easy pregnancy ever, I have known young healthy girl to have complications. But I dint have a single issue. Not one complication. She dint only advise us medically, but spoke and counseled us on a personal level. She helped us become more mature, take further responsibility, prepare us financially and most of all she turned us into parents before our baby came. She instilled the feeling of mother and father into us , always ensured we put the pregnancy and the baby first and the highest priority. I had one of the most smoothest delivery. I don’t know when it started and when it ended. Again zero complications. I was walking and resuming all my normal activities the next day. I felt no pain , no issues.  Today we are blessed with a baby and it’s all due to her guidance. I recently met her for follow up, asked her when can we try again, her answer was minimum 2 years. Any other doc would have said anything between 6months to 1year. But she saw my and my newborn’s well being first. It’s like she is allergic to money. I was paranoid during entire preg and kept asking her for some or the other thing which would have earned her a lot of money, but all she did was turn me down. Her only advise was bed rest, food and lifestyle. She is very particular about tests and scans though, to a level where she will call the scan people personally while my scan is getting done. She knew the report before it was printed. She is like an anxious mother. She does not overlook anything. She is blunt, very honest ( may seem rude), extremely ethical , disciplined , highly principled. If you are looking for a doctor who sugar coats and is very diplomatic or will provide you polite customer service, you need to go to a good hotel. Because she is only about the baby, medical and ethics. By the end of my preg she was like my family member. She is on top of all latest medical and technological updates. She does not need to look at your file, does not forget any detail. Is always available for chats on whatsapp. Towards last few weeks of my preg she was more bothered about my reports than her fees. As mine was a HR pregnancy she never bothered me to come multiple times for visits. Her only concern was my baby’s safe delivery. If every doctor in the world is like her than there will no patients. I wish she was my paediatrician,  my dentist, my physiotherapist etc etc etc. Grateful is a small word, Me, my husband and our families are indebted to her forever.
reply_text: Thanks for listening to me for the past one year and having the faith in my treatment Pallavi.

review:
** ****** *** ****** ***** ** **** *** ** *** **** ****** ** *** ** **** *** I strongly recommend Dr. Aparna Panda to everyone.

We came across her through Google reviews for best doctor in electronic City. Our frequent visits to her has built confidence that we have selected right gynecologist and we never had a second thought about it. 

We started consulting her when we though of planning for baby. Our priority was Normal delivery and with great experience and able guidance of Dr. Aparna Panda we did have a normal delivery without any complications in Cloudnine Electronic City under her supervision. Her calm and positive nature always gives you positive vibes and ensures your pregnancy journey becomes more easy and worthy experience. At times you will be surprised and amazed by the confidences she has in her work, which clearly shows she knows what she is doing and what needs to be done for betterment of mom and baby.********* ***** **** ** ** *********** ********* she focus on healthy lifestyle and proper diet.

In fact, Dr. Aparna Panda is highly ************** humble, and very practical. What we really liked about her is she gives sufficient time to the patients and explains each and everything. She is a great human being and treated us like a family member and taken utmost care during pregnancy, delivery and she continues to do so event post delivery. She was also available on mobile in case we needed any immediate help and guidance. Though it was our first experience of pregnancy, but we really enjoyed the Journey with great support from Dr. Aparna Panda. 

Thank you so much Mam for everything!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy,Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
I understand the value and impact of honest reviews of doctors as i found and chose my OB-GYN, Dr. Aparnaa through the same process after a lot of online research and i am happy to completely vouch for her expertise and actions after delivering my healthy baby boy, vaginally at full term, 10 days back. 

Dr. Aparnaa has been the light bearer throughout my pregnancy journey right from week 5 until week 38 when i delivered. Although she may come off as a very strict gynae, but in reality that’s exactly what is needed for a healthy pregnancy. I was at a risk of gestational diabetes and high BP but thanks to her constant vigilance and diet charting, i made it through without any need for medications at any instance for the above while being active throughout my pregnancy (driving to work until 1 week prior to delivery)

She answered each and every query of mine patiently(even with diagrams), be it originating from myths from family and friends, google-researched scientific data or just silly random thoughts in the head. One very good and convenient thing about Dr. Panda is that she remembers her patients’ history and answers all your questions on whatsapp texts.

Lastly i would like to write that had it not been her and her excellent team of practitioners in scrubs at the labour room/OT, it wouldn’t have been possible for me to have a normal vaginal delivery at any cost; given the fact that i had signed a written consent of C-section in case of emergencies. Thank you so much ma’am for this invaluable experience.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I would like to thank everyone who gave their reviews, which helped me decide to meet Dr. Aparna, when my wife was pregnant with our first child. Having stayed in many cities and having met many doctors for different medical problems, I usually have trust issues when it comes to medical help and it was no different even this time. I have hardly met doctors who actually believe in what they do and unless you are ready to try what they are asking of you, they tell you on your face to seek medical attention elsewhere. I respect these doctors because they take accountability of their patients and are not ready to take any chances with their health conditions. 

Dr. Aparna was happy to listen to us everytime we met her but was never inclined to make any changes for my wife's diet plan which could allow her to gain more weight. All through the pregnancy period she kept a strict watch on my wife's health and counselled both of us to make the right choices and decisions. I now understand that for a pregnant woman, her gynaecologist is somebody who she can not only open up in confidence and trust with her changes and challenges, but also someone who can create a cushion of comfort should something not go as planned. Our child's delivery happened in one of the most unplanned conditions but Dr. Aparna seemed unfazed and ensured a successful normal delivery, with both my wife and child in perfect health. She was instrumental in getting the facilities and staff ready for the delivery process even before I could fill in the in-patient documentation.

Needless to say that we were lucky to have had Dr. Aparna as my wife's gynaecologist. She has not only been there for my wife but also for our child. I was not happy with the paediatrician that we met at the hospital and was referred to for further OPD consultations. Dr. Aparna sensed that and recommended us to another child specialist. Our child is 4 months old now and we still continue to meet the same paediatrician and are very happy with his treatment. Not only do we recommend Dr. Aparna to our friends but would recommed her to anybody willing to experience a smooth and successful pregrancy with the best chances of a normal delivery, without any frown or frustration or any agonising moments of distrust. From the multiple reviews, I can understand that she has time and again offered the same experience to many couples like us and we can only be thankful for her support. Thank you very much Dr. Aparna.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: We met Dr Aparnaa in 2014 in RKH for Family Planning that time we were not aware about my wife issue(SLE) but every time Dr suggesting(symptom of bone pain) us to go to Orthopedic once but we ignored her advise and continue with her treatment and after 4-5 months she got all symptom of pregnancy but unfortunately she didn't got pregnant because of SLE issue, we moved to another Dr even so many Dr because Dr Aparnaa Said that is not related to Gynecology and she was right , we went to several Dr and hospital for her issue why she is not getting pregnant after one year we got correct Dr. for her SLE issue and she controlled her issue in 6 to 7 months and finally she got pregnant. Why I am writing this whole story because when I met SLE Dr. (she is Rheumatologist which is extended form of Orthopedic) and i realized what Dr Aparnaa Panda said to us in 2014 which we have done in 2016 *** *** *********** *** ******** * that time i have  decided when she will be pregnant i will go to her even my wife and other people suggested me some other Dr. Now after pregnancy also it was not easy going for us because my Wife had SLE and in it there are chances of miscarriage was very high that we observed in 1st month itself from there Dr Aparnaa shown fully of expertise and experience and carried out to us in 9th month , she continuously supported us morally , emotionally as a Dr or friend  which is very special in her and i rarely seen in any Dr.,She told me in alone that chances of premature baby is very high which was also told by our SLE and other Dr whom we consult during pregnancy but because of her continuous motivation, treatment, expertise and wonderful nature of caring her patient, we blessed with Healthy baby Girl which is now 23 days old. Thanks Dr you are really proved that still Dr could be treated as Second GOD , the way you handle our case was amazing , the way you care your patient that is also wonderful. I have already wrote so many things still i have lot of things to say about you...Thankyou so much again and again for the Happiness which you have given us for lifetime..

review:
To Start, firstly we were Thankful to Dr. Aparnaa Panda for all the support during this entire journey starting from pregnancy confirmation to till NORMAL delivery. I take this opportunity to mention our experience with Dr. Aparna panda, so that it shall be useful to others , i can explain this in 3 steps...

1) Choosing right doctor: Finding right doctor is every thing that decides your entire journey, To provide best care to mother and child and we have googled and learned about as many as doctors with in radius of 20km from my place, read every review of doctors, their expertise, experience, behavior of clinic staff, waiting time, followups etc., after analyzing all the information we choose Dr Aparnaa Panda *** *** ******** **** ********* *** **** **** ** ********* she suggests only necessary things nothing else.... no unnecessary medications, no unnecessary tests or scanning..... 

2) Choosing Right Hospital: Having coming from other southern state, we planned delivery in our native place, again wanting to give best care and service i have enquired and visited few hospitals in southern states that ensures normal delivery, but none of places gave me confidence to my expectations,,, Then Dr. Aparnaa recommended Rainbow hospital,,,, we visited and enquired about rainbow hospital and having strong belief in Dr. Aparnaa, we choose rainbow hospital....

3) Type and during delivery:  I strongly hope my child birth should occur normally, but having seeing pains of the mother ,couple of hours before delivery , i requested Dr. Aparnaa to take any decision to make the delivery as soon as possible, still she made it smooth NORMAL delivery....

Loads of thanks to Dr. Aparnaa Panda for all the support and guidance....
reply_text: Many thanks for posting your story online. Congratulations on your wife's normal delivery.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I still remember 01 of Sept when I did a pregnancy check test and realized that something unusual is happening with my body... I was happy and but equally worried that I never consulted any Doctor before conceiving. So, I decided to lookout for Doctors who can guide me. Needless to mention, “This was the first experience”

This is when I accidentally met “Dr. Aparna Panda” and, "the ease at which she treated me and made me comfortable”, I think every women should have this accidental experience.

Throughout the whole pregnancy, she was always there to help and guide me… You name any technology and she was on “Top of it”. She just told me one thing during the initial stage “Vandana, if you not clear on anything, wtsapp me even if it is late..". ***** ******** **** * **** ********* ** *** *********** *** * ********* ******** *** ******** **** *** ********** **** **********

I was during my 7 month diagnosed with gestational diabetes and had to undergo a lot of test but every time when the results came, I knew why these were required... Over a period of time, Thanks to Dr. Aparna, everything was under control.
She makes you feel very comfortable and explain everything in detail. 
On 18th April, I was worried and tensed when I got admitted but I was confident that I am in safe hands. The last thing that I remember is that I was happy entering and exiting OT of the hospital and the very next day, Dr.Aparna started pushing me to start walking. I was into pain but I know why she said this.. So thanks again!!  


Now below message is for ladies who feels their husbands are not ready for babies or don’t like visiting hospitals… 
Trust me ladies, Dr. Aparna has such a magic that your husband will start loving the whole experience of visiting and talking to Doctors… There have been times when he is directly discussing few things with Dr. Aparna and used to update me on the next steps….
Now, a lot of you might feel that it is natural – Trust me, It’s not!!! And even if it is, I would still give credit to Dr. Aparna as her nature itself makes everyone comfy.

So after writing on my entire experience, I would like to say “A BIG THANKYOU” to Dr. Aparna… If I have a healthy baby, it’s because of “YOU”. You came out of nowhere and offered me “A WORLD OF HAPPINESS”.
THANK YOU !!

tags: None
review:
Mine has been a tough pregnancy. Dr.Aparna Panda made it a beautiful experience. SHE IS THE BEST!!
I truly recommend her to anyone and suggest to just keep the trust on her. Dr.Aparna Panda will make sure mom and baby are safe in the time of pregnancy and are delivered safely. 

I first met her in January2013 when I was pregnant with my first baby. I was going through depression because of my father's death and was obese and 32 then, with constant panic attacks. She made me first comfortable and mentally prepared me to accept that I will be fine. She brought the confidence in me that I will be a happy mother and I delivered a beautiful boy in August 3013. 

2.5 years later I am again pregnant with my second baby and this time it's much more difficult and complicated. I had an emergency of a slippped miscarriage in the second month and I was actually thinking of not continuing my pregnancy as it's so threatening. To my amazement she made me believe confidently just within a week that I will be able to sail through very well and this time too I will deliver very safely a healthy baby. I also have high BP problems and get stressed very soon. Still Dr. Aparna Panda made sure everything is in control.

It's now my 7th month and I am eagerly waiting for my due date which is on 1st week of July. I am happy that I have Dr. Aparna Panda beside me and I know I have trusted the right person. 

I don't know the definition of a best doctor, but I know that Dr. Aparna Panda has been the best doctor who is a saviour to her patients. They are in safest hands and all they have to do is PUT COMPLETE TRUST IN HER. That's enough and the final experience any patient would have is "THANK GOD, I WAS HANDLED BY DR. APARNA PANDA". 

SHE HAS BEEN AND IS THE BEST. 

I wish her all the best in her career and life full of happiness as she is the cause so many smiles of so many contented and happy mother's.

A loyal &satisfied patient and a great well wisher!!

Lakshmi Ravi.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited doc Aparnaa in the month of July 2021 after reading positive review on Google and practo. On my first visit I was anxious and bit worried as this was my first pregnancy but Dr. Aparnaa was kind enough to answer all my doubts. Thereafter I started visiting her regularly. My due date was in 1st week of March but my water broke on 28th January 2022. I was not sure whether really my water broke or was it something else. I visited Dr. Aparnaa for confirmation and she immediately told me to get admitted in Rainbow Hospital Bannerghatta. By the time I reached hospital I was in labour and pain increased as time passed by. Dr. Aparnaa came and visited me in Rainbow Hospital and told me that they won't be doing anything to stop or induce labour. Dr. Aparnaa was in constant touch with duty dr. Enquiring about my health condition. Since the pain became unbearable by 5.30 I went for epidural and I was told that I would be delivering between 8-10pm. After taking epidural at 6pm the pain reduced for an hour and again it started by 7pm. By this time Dr. Aparnaa had come to labour room and set everything for delivery. At 7.41 I delivered baby girl normally. Since my baby was about to be delivered way before it's due date I was scared whether I'll be able to deliver normally or have to understand c-section. But with Dr. Aparnaa's support and hospital staff's help I was able to deliver normally. I would any day recommend Dr. Aparnaa for normal delivery. I am very thankful to Dr. Aparnaa for making my pregnancy journey smooth and memorable.

context: Pregnancy Check Up,PCOD/PCOS Treatment,Vaginal Infection Treatment,Pregnancy Scan,
review:
Most of us are hesitant to approach a new Gynecologist, so was I hesitant but since we switched houses I had to choose someone closer. I came across Dr Aparnaa Panda, on my first visit to the doctor I felt she had a different approach compared to the others who I visited in the city. Her approach gave me the results I was seeking. Since then I have been consulting Dr Aparnaa Panda and it's been 3 Years from then. The reasons for visiting her each year was different. My recent visit was to confirm my pregnancy. Thereafter, throughout my pregnancy, from Day 1 she has been very cautious and ticked all basic checkpoints to make sure the baby is safe at every milestone until the delivery. She kept a close watch on my monthly follow ups and monitored regularly on my sugar and BP levels to make sure the baby is not at risk at any time. She doesn't take even 1% chance in a high risk situation. Even during my admission to the hospital, she and her staff followed up with me until I was hospitalized and took necessary steps to induce normally. With 16+ hours of inducing and with very little dilation. She took up a decision that's time sensitive and delivered our little bundle of joy in no time. Dr Aparnaa Panda is a very straightforward, hardworking, efficient and approachable doctor. You will get to know these traits when you visit her. And yes, she is strict when you don't follow up her instructions for your own good.
My experience with Dr Aparnaa Panda and her staff has been great! They have been nothing less than sincere, upfront and satisfactory at every level. Her approach and solutions towards the problems are very unique. She is a strict observer and follower of how your body responds and treats accordingly. She takes your inputs and feedbacks seriously at all times and answers all your questions. (It's best to get all your questions written on a notepad so that you don forget to ask her). However, She is available on WhatsApp to help answer your questions otherwise.
With time and results seen, I would definitely recommend her if you are looking for a good OBGN to help you.
reply_text: Thanks Sumayya. Wishing you a very happy Motherhood

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I clearly remember the day I walked into Dr.Aparna's clinic all anxious after knowing about my pregnancy. We chose to visit her as her name top the list on Google even though when you read some of the reviews it might mislead you. We (me and my husband) as individuals always believe in having our own experience than believing in social media reviews which are mostly used to vent out anger but very few people would want to write about the good experiences coz who cares ?! I felt like sharing mine coz this should help someone in determining the right decision. The 9 months of my pregnancy journey with Dr.Aparna has been extremely satisfying. The way she has handled all my queries throughout and explaining complications if any, I can't thank her enough for her care, promptness and honesty. I would specially want to mention one of my crucial and life changing experience with her as a covid  mother who have just delivered a healthy baby boy, for which i have the highest regard for her. I had severe chest infection due to covid during my 35th week of pregnancy and had to be hospitalised in SOS. The way she had handled my case from helping me admitted in emergency to keeping me in priority without even thinking once that shifting me to another top hospital (who has better covid treatment facility than the maternity specialised hospital I was admitted in) in the city of Bengaluru during the last weeks of my pregnancy which ideally means is letting your patient go at the end moment, but she chose my health on top priority and advised us on the real time situation. During any emergency she was just a WhatsApp away for my queries. The clinic has super supportive staff, well managed patient queue and all the necessary arrangements an expecting mother would look for. Highly recommend Dr.Aparna and personally would want to stay in touch for any of my future gynec related issues. Best wishes to the team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
First of all I am extremely thankful to Dr. Aparnaa, under her treatment I have delivered a healthy baby boy through Normal delivery.
I visited Dr. Aparnaa when I was 4 months pregnant. She went through all old reports and explained everything. When I asked doctor if I can go for normal delivery, I was amazed to see how doctor encouraged us and 
gave us believe that she will definitely try for normal delivery first, C-section is 2nd option though I had gestational diabetes. 

As it was my first pregnancy, so me and my husband had lot of doubts. Aparnaa ma'am always answered all queries with lot of patience. She is so friendly in nature and same time she is strict on certain guidelines like; diet, regular walking which is actually good for pregnant mother and baby's health.

During covid lockdown, when many clinics are closed, Dr. Aparnaa never stopped looking after her patients. She always told me to keep in touch with her through Whatsapp.

I was nervous thinking how my delivery will be done during lockdown. But Doctor gave us relief and trust that she will be always there to take care of her patients whether it is lockdown or not. Even if pregnant mother becomes covid positive, she will never leave her patients. This is best thing you can hear from a doctor at this situation and I will be always grateful to Aparnaa Ma'am for that.

I will highly recommend Dr. Aparnaa to everyone whether you are planning for normal delivery or c-section delivery or any maternity related problem. Once you visit her, you will not regret your decision.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
** *** ******** ******* ** *** ****** **** ** *** *** ** ******* ***** *** ****** **** *** ** ** We are blessed with a  Baby boy on December 6th at Rainbow Hospital , BG road. 

This review is just a small token of thanks for her . Words are not enough to express our gratitude for Dr Aparnaa Panda.  

We wanted an initial scan and that too in the lockdown period.  Most of the well known Hospitals and Clinic (including the Doctor whom we visited before lockdown) refused to do a scan. We saw a review on google and visited Dr Aparnaa Clinic . She adhered to all the Corona Specific guidelines in her Clinic and that impressed us. She did the initial scan and has given minimal medicines to start . She explained about the diet importance and some daily exercises to be done and was too soft to my wife while explaining all. No unnecessary tests or medicines prescribed by her in the entire tenure. We faced another  setback during the 35 weeks of pregnancy when we (all family members) got infected to COVID-19. In this tensed situation we talked to  her even at  mid-night (without hesitation) . She suggested us some medicines and some precautionary measures to be taken. She was in regular  touch with me and my wife , taking all daily health updates during our home quarantine. She was always interested  in a normal delivery . After getting admitted to Rainbow on 5th Dec, she tried her best for the normal delivery. Thing got slightly complicated when the baby heart rate went too down and later baby has passed motions. Even under this immense tensed situation , she was calm and confident about the well being of mother and kid. With God's Grace and Dr Aparnaa expertise , we were blessed with a healthy Baby Boy.

Thanks a lot again to Dr Aparnaa Panda. :)
reply_text:
Thank you so much for such a detailed feedback. Yes I remember it was so difficult to keep our clinic open during the pandemic. Initial days of the lock down, I had to convince our staff to come to the clinic. They we so scared and the police used to harress them on the way. We had to keep our board light off and some other anxious patients in Ranka colony used to come and ask us every alternate day whether we were open or not. In that period, your wife had come to me in a very anxious state due to her previous bad experience and I am vey happy to provide the best of support during the pandemic. It was my duty to provide online support during unfortunate event of covid striking your family members.
We take great pride in being available during the lock down of the  pandemic and giving quality service while maintaining social distancing, ensuring all wear masks and use hand sanitisers at our clinic. Thank you so much for the understanding and cooperation that your family maintained. except for the patient, no other family member was allowed inside the chamber, which you understood as a ICMR protocol and had no complains against.
Thanks also for appreciating my efforts to try for natural delivery of all my patients whether days or night. . 
Congratulations on being the father of a healthy baby. Happy Parenting!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would like to start by saying that Dr Aparnaa is god to me because she has saved my life. I have been living in US for more than a decade and I was under the impression that doctors/treatment available in US are best but that is a complete myth. I was having heavy period for past 6-7 months continuously and was getting treated here in US. Doctors in US prescribed me medicine name “Provera” which made my situation really bad and due to that I had so much of loss, my blood count went down to 5 and I had to go through blood transfusion in US. US doctor could never figure out the actual problem and kept giving me high dose of “Provera”. After 6-7 month of going through struggle and almost loosing my life due to so much of blood loss, I decided to take opinion from Doctor in India and that’s where I came in contact with “Dr Aparnaa Panda”. She looked at all my US medical reports, explained possible issues. She was worried about the treatment I was getting in US and recommended me to travel to India so that she can look into the problem/solution in right way. After 2 week of my virtual appointment with Dr Aparnaa, I came to India and met her in her clinic. She immediately took action and prescribed many tests to figure out the actual problem. She gave me few medication that I took for 4 days and my bleeding almost stopped. I had surgery done on 6th day by Dr Aparnaa after my bleeding was stopped and the whole process from start to end took 10 days. I am treated 200% for my problem in 10 days by Dr Aparnaa which US doctors could not even figure out in 7 months. She kept her check on me post surgery and gave advices for fast recovery over Whatsapp. I just can’t imagine what situation I would have been if I wouldn’t have contacted Dr Aparnaa. It’s been close to a month and I got my regular period which ended on time without any issues. ** ******* ** ** ************** humble and of motherly nature. She has taken care of me so well that I will be thankful to her all over my life. I recommend her to anyone for gynaec related problem and I am sure she will take care of you. I am going to recommend her to several females in US who are struggling to get treated for similar problem as mine. Thanks so much Dr Aparnaa for taking care of me.
reply_text:
Thanks for taking the time for such a detailed feedback. And this has come right from your heart. 
It gave me great professional and personal satisfaction to take care of you and provide you with a favourable outcome. 
Please come back soon with the good news.

reply_text: Hurt to see ur untrue allegations here.  I dont own any medical store or lab. This clinic is rental property. I dont do IVF and so dont recommend IVF unless their reports are beyond treatment. U have done tests to find out what both ur problems are and I have given medicines to treat the problems. Before doing the tests both of u didnt know what ur problem was. If u had taken the medications I had prescribed u, u might have concieved naturally and like most of my patients already have during the lockdown period. Our social distancing and covid precautions are as per ICMR guidelines. Even attenders were not allowed inside the doctors chamber. during the lockdown period. Thats what u didnt like......HOW DARE THE DOCTOR NOT ALLOW U IN HER CHAMBERS DESPITE............ and hence have posted this defamatory review.

review:
I started visiting Dr. Aparna from 3rd Month of my wife's pregnancy and from that time till the day I was blessed with a boy she has taken care of all what was needed. I must tell she is extremely well aware and professional on every front, a bit strict but certainly needed.
There was a time in around 6month, when we got really tensed( since we did our non medico reading on internet) after a scan which showed cervix length to be short, but Dr. Aparna made us really confortable and kept things under control by just medication rather than complex procedures to prevent pre-term.
Post 38 weeks, we went for a routine checkup along final growth scan,when she suggested to get admitted since water level was fluctuating, she did multiple checkup with some interval to come to this conclusion. She was certain and explained us about all the possible scenario's, so that we can make our mind well before rather that wasting time to decide during labour.
It was induced labour,so that normal delivery can be attempted.With god's grace my wife's body responded well due to timely decision and effort from Dr.Aparna along with all the staff of the hospital. The wife as well as baby are healthy and fine, and were discharged the next day after all the neccessary checkups and test.
All in all it was a wonderful experience with Dr. Aparna Panda.

I am really thankfull to Dr. Aparna for all the effort and guidance.My wife always wanted normal delivery and she made sure to do all possible to fullfill that.

I have been consulting Dr Aparna for the last 2 years.This is my second review for her .
******** ** ******* *** **** ** *** **** **** **** * ********she is extremely caring about her patients.
She goes that extra mile of sharing her watsap number so that we can consult her whenever in doubt.
My delivery date was scheduled for dec 30th 2017,but i started getting mild pain in the abdomen and cramps on 7th,and slight vaginal discharge sort off,i jus intimated aparna over watsapp at around 8pm in the night,she suspected a water leak and asked to me to go to my consulting hospital and get it checked right away,i said her i eill go Next day,she asked me to leave right away,when i contacted the hospital they said they dont do the tests at night,i informed the same to her,she was so swift and caring that she called up the pro of the hospital and the pro contacted me asap and apologized fr the misscommunication from the hospital call center,she informed me that the on duty dr will. check and the tests an be done 24/7.
I went immediately to the hospital and got it checked and aparna followed up over phone and ensured that there s no water leak and i  am perfectly fine and then went home.Such is her attitude towards patients.
Unexpectedly mine was a sudden c section because i started getting contractions ,but baby head was nit fixed, so aparna suggested to wait for few more hours for the head to fix,but it did not and she suggested its better to go for c section ,because baby head fixing was uncertain and also i had already gine through mild labour contractions for more than 24 hours, she promptly came on time and conducted the c section and delivered a beautiful healthy baby boy on dec 10th.
Myself and my family are always grateful to Dr Aparna..

review: Posting on behalf of my wife..In Short - We've been visiting Dr Aparnaa for 2 years, initially for a surgery and then pregnancy. She is exceptional and has taken care of like a gem.I can't express enough gratitude for the exceptional care provided by Dr. Aparnaa throughout the pregnancy journey and the challenging NVD. From the very first prenatal visit to the delivery room, Dr. Aparnaa demonstrated an unparalleled commitment to ensuring both mine and my baby's well-being.Dr. Aparnaa'a attentiveness and dedication were evident from the beginning. The doctor's calm and reassuring demeanor helped alleviate anxieties that often accompany pregnancy. No unwanted medicines were prescribed, a healthy diet was suggested by the doctor and I was able to keep the vitals under control along with body weight.What truly set apart was the prompt response during the crucial moments of the delivery. As I got the labour pain, we reached the hospital and informed the doctor, the doctor's ability to reach the hospital in no time, very early in the morning, played a crucial role in ensuring a safe and successful delivery.Throughout the labor process, Dr. Aparnaa maintained a perfect balance of professionalism and empathy. Clear communication and genuine concern for both me and my baby's well-being were evident at every step. The doctor's expertise was evident, and the calm presence provided much-needed reassurance during a crucial situation by which I was able to give birth naturally to a healthy baby boy.The postpartum care was equally exceptional.  Doctor continued to monitor both my recovery and the baby's health, ensuring a smooth transition into motherhood. The consistent follow-up appointments further highlighted the doctor's commitment to their patients' long-term well-being.Dr. Aparnaa is not just a skilled medical professional but a genuine lifesaver. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I would like to share the amazing experience of my pregnancy term and a normal vaginal delivery that was made possible by the guidance of Dr. Aparna Maam. I got to know about her from google reviews and started consulting her from the very first day of suspect of my pregnancy. She is a very professional doctor, neither used any sugar-coated words nor prescribed any unnecessary medication. This has been our 1st pregnancy and being totally unexperienced, she guide us like a friend and supported us with prompt response through whatapp on any minute health related issues. Since I am bit obese with a family history of hypertension, she suggested me to stick to a very controlled diet and following her instruction the entire 9 months had been the most amazing and easy-going experience one can ever think off. I gained very minimal weight during this time and thanks to God, did not suffer from any added complications of gestational diabetics or high blood pressure. Following her guidelines, I must happily admit that I was able to fit into my regular dresses even on the 9th month of pregnancy. Not only about looks, I was able to carry on with my regular chores and office works without any discomfort till the last moment of pregnancy, until the water broke. This happened just the next day of visiting her on my 37th weeks and she too warned me to be prepared as she observed that I have already started to dilate. Although I got admitted to Rainbow hospital just after the water broke, I was not getting pain and she suggested to medically induce labor. Even then the labor processed very slowly and I was hardly getting any contractions. A heartfelt thanks to doctor and the support staff in the hospital as they have been extremely patient and waited for 19 hours to let it happen naturally. Interestingly, towards midnight I felt light contraction and was put on epidural, which soothed my pain. Right after that, again thanking God here, as my baby too held long along with me and that dilation started to progress naturally. Early in the next morning I was fully dilated and doctor proceeded with normal vaginal delivery. Thanks to all the supporting doctors and nurses in the labor room as I couldn't have done it without their push. Within 30-40 mins Aparna maam handed me my bundle of joy and it was such a wonderful feeling to see the body I was nurturing within my body. I would give all credit to her for such a smooth and satisfactory experience of the otherwise know extremely painful process and helping me delivery a healthy boy and support my post process recovery as well.
Finally, me and my husband are very glad and count ourselves fortunate to have consulted Aparna maam and her supportive team of radiologist, nurses, consultants and receptionist for their prompt and adequate response in time of need. I will always recommend my friends, family and acquaintances to consult her for any Gynae-related problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Thank you Aparnna Man for making my family complete. With immense please am saying that I blessed with baby boy 3 weeks back and full credit goes to m'am for making my pregnancy life so easy after getting many complications during pregnancy tenure😄🙏❤️...I had recommended 2 of my friends and I sincerely request the readers to meet once if you have gynological problem. I must tell you will never regret on your decision....I still remember very first day when i meet m'am after seeing her profile on practo two years back.I was having lumps in my breast with mild pain and severe itching during night. By seeing that she had recognised root cause and recommended test and medicine with that it got cured. She is extremely well qualified in her field and passainote towards her profession.In June 2020 I consulted her again online on prato because of the covid, with mensuration issue. She understood problem immediately and refer to do test and scanning. I was digonised with polycystic ovary syndrome . After taking the medicine of 1 month I got conceived and my pregnancy journey had started.I was on complete rest during intial days due to previous health history and Aparnaa mam was to much concerned about my health. She was always available for me during my complete pregnancy. After 4 month of my pregnancy, I was digonised with ICP, it has started with severe itching on palm and foot. When i had communicated this issue to her, she had suggested to do blood test and Lever function test and I was digonised with ICP in pregnancy. She had proscribed to take udiliv and meet lever specialist to take 2nd opinion. Once we meet lever specialist, he had also recommend same medicine whatever mam had been suggested. I want say that she is very confident in her treatment but always wanted to take 2nd opinion with related specialist. When i digonised with ICP mam had been given complete confidence that nothing will happen to you and your baby till 37th week of pregnancy. I was doing blood and lever function test at every 2 to 3 weeks to know the health conditions as recommended by Mam.Finally my journey of pregnancy ended with lots of joy and happiness and i delivered baby boy through LSCS due to breech position of baby. The LSCS process was very smooth and I had started walking from 2nd day onwards. I have recovered completely and both my baby and me are doing well...😄😄😄At last I wanted to say that, She takes care of her patients like her own family members and always available for them. She is very much passionate about her work and well versed in her field. She gives best advice to bring your confidence level up. I highly recommend Mam. Thank you mam once again😄❤️🙏👍👍
reply_text:
Thank you so much for believing in me. My passion for patient care wouldn't have been successful without you listening to me. 
Both you and your husband are such a wonderful couple. You understood that it is worth doing all these tests repeatedly and meeting liver specialist repeatedly rather than doing a preterm delivery for the severe ICP you had. By this, we were successfully able to prevent NICU admission for the baby. 

Happy motherhood my dear patient. My best wishes to your family.

review:
I visited Doctor Aparna for my wife pregnancy check-up. We were trying for our first baby for the long time and finally. Once we got the positive pregnancy test then we decided to find the best doctor who can treat and help us through out the pregnancy. I got Aparna's recommendation from one of my friend, so we decided to visit her in the clinic. We consulted the Doctor and honestly she went through my wife's all medical history regarding the pregnancy and gave us enough time. She was very much careful in treating my wife through out the pregnancy. She has given necessary medicines to sustain the pregnancy. My wife went through several pregnancy complications, but she has guided and treated well in all the stages.

She treat her patient very kindly, but sometimes she gets angry for the patient well being. And this is fair enough to get angry with the patients if they do not listen to doctor advice :)

Finally, when I admitted my wife for the delivery, I was little worried as she was having some complications, but Doctor handles all the process very well and we were blessed with healthy baby boy and healthy mother.

Doctor tried her best for normal delivery, but it was not possible because of complications and we went for C-Section. 

Overall, I am very much happy to have a healthy baby and mother  under the supervision and treatment of Doctor Aparna.

Thanks Doctor! keep doing great work and bring smiles to many parents :)

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I have consulted Dr Aparna mam for my first pregnancy which was definitely a high risk pregnancy with multiple prior surgeries for endometriosis and hysteroscopy for polypectomy of uterus...I visited mam since my 6 th week of pregnancy as soon as uterine pregnancy tested positive.It's been a roller coaster ride ...Initially with subchorionic heamatoma and excessive bleeding at 9 week with hospitalization at Rainbow hospital.But due to Dr Aparna 's proper treatment and guidance I recovered that phase....Mam was strict at the same time which act as a boon in my case to control my B.P throughout my pregnancy...I was hypertensive before pregnancy but throughout pregnancy since second trimester I could stop B.p medication and my gestational diabetes was also well under control only with diet ,no medicines required only by Mam's proper guidance....Mam was always available in watsapp in any of my emergencies or even with my silly doubts...Finally on 12th July 2023, I was blessed with a baby boy (Omm Sai Ram!)in Cloud nine Electronic City branch through an elective c-section surgery.....Surgery experience was smooth and mam was there all throughout....Though after delivery now I am struggling with high B.P issues for which medicines are going on.Hopefully by God's grace I recover soon.... Finally a big thanx and lots of gratitude to Dr Aparna mam and her team,the radiologist of her clinic and all staffs from Aparna Women's clinic..... Selvi,Sindu and all were of great help .....

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I checked Dr.Aparna's profile in practo and was very much impressed by her positive reviews on normal delivery. So, we decided to consult her for pregnancy check ups. I had my own birth plan like breastfeeding in the 1st one hr, delayed cord clamping and skin to skin. Dr.Aparna agreed to all of it and I was totally satisfied when she mentioned that she practices all of it. So, we convinced our parents to have the delivery in Bangalore itself instead of our native.The pregnancy went on really smooth, did walking, squatting, yoga and was active throughout the pregnancy,ensured not to gain more weight. Doctor also promised 99% for normal delivery inspite of the low water level. She suggested us Cloud Nine hospital  (Electricity) for delivery. I started  contractions on Aug 7th around 8.30 pm. We rushed to the hospital around 1.30am, and hospital staff started treatment immediately after reaching the hospital. Dr.Aparna had a wonderful team in Cloud Nine hospital hospital, Electricity..they swiftly made all the arrangements and I delivered a girl baby on 8th Aug, 4.32AM through normal delivery. My sincere thanks to the doctors. Service provided at Cloud Nine hospital was impressive. This being our first pregnancy, things went on smooth because of kindness and support of the nurses in the ward throughout our stay.My sincere gratitude to Dr.Aparna for extending her support during my pregnancy. She was always available in watsapp to support. She is extremely professional and will not panic you at any time. She did her best for the healthy mother and baby. Special thanks for recommending Cloud Nine hospital, we were extremely happy about the service provided.

review:
During my first trimester I was diagnosed with thyroid and diabetes. At that time I was consulting with another gynaecologist . She was not able to control my diabetes, so she sent me to some general physician. He gave me the medication to control my sugar level, but those medicine doesn’t suits me , it increases my sugar level more. I was vomiting uncontrollably, not able to eat any thing, my condition was getting worse day by day. So I decided to change my gynaecologist and I visited dr. Aparna. The first time I met her, I realised her care and concern for the patient. After seeing my condition she stopped all my medication and suggest me proper diet to control my nausea and diabetes. During my whole pregnancy she support me physically as well as mentally. Whenever I have a problem or  doubt she replied me through messages. She is very attentive, always replies me as soon as possible. My whole journey of pregnancy was very difficult, but she encourages me and gave me mental strength. 
Now I am a mother of daughter, thanks to dr. Aparna. She is an angel to me.

tags: Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: We found Doctor Aparnaa Panda through Practo and visited her first at Bannerghata Road Rainbow Hospital and then at Anjana clinic at Electronic City. I must say that she has been a revelation for us. When we first got an inkling that our little one was on the way, the usual fears and distress about finding the right doctor surfaced. The first trimester is also fraught with issues which reflected in us being a bit anxious. But when we met her, all our fears were dispelled. She is caring and compassionate. She patiently listened to all our questions, issues and general queries and clarified them one-by-one patiently and diligently and with a great aplomb. She dispelled a lot of myths that one generally hears from others. She kept us at ease and ensured that we always left the clinic smiling and relieved. She also went out-of-the way to ensure that a couple of other doctors at Marathahalli were informed that we may be meeting them in case of something cropping up. And the best part is that she is available 24/7 on phone and chat. The moment we post a query she replies within a jiffy. We look forward to being in her safe hands till our little one emerges into the world. For anyone looking for a good gynecologist/doctor to place your trust in – look no further.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We visited dr aparna for my second pregnancy. I had conceived again after 7.5 years and was a little apprehensive about being pregnant after such a long time. We consulted with dr aparna after reading positive reviews about her and her preference for normal delivery as my first delivery was normal.We were happy with the consultation throughout my pregnancy, covid measures taken in her clinic,also diet advice given by her. She was also available on whatsapp whenever we had any doubts. During my 36th week I was tested covid positive which gave us a scare regarding baby’s health. Dr Aparna assured it wont affect the baby but as a precaution she insisted to induce labour once I get a negative covid test report .Finally on 25th july I was admitted to rainbow hospital and my baby was born the same night through normal delivery.Even after delivery doctor visited me in the ward throughout my stay there and on the day of my discharge when she had to go out of town on an emergency she paid me a visit early in the morning around 530-6 am to check up on me.I highly recommend Dr Aparna panda for any OB consultation.

review:

We have consulted Dr. Aparnaa for our first child from the inception till the normal delivery of a healthy Baby. Dr. Helped and guided us to control every aspect of the pregnancy physically and mentally. We are really grateful to Dr. Aparnaa and staffs who all supported us through out this journey and we would recommend aspirant parents to trust the clinic and doctor, follow each words and suggestions of the Dr. Finally, we just wanted to assure you that you are in a good hands if you are with Dr, Aparnaa.

review:

  My experience with her from the first day was full of happy moments.Every medicine, every scan and every test recommended by her was very useful. I never felt uneasy throughout  my pregnancy .
