tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We are very great full to Dr. Aparna Panda for the kind of support she has given us. We are in consultation with Dr. Aparna Panda for more than 2yrs. During first pregnancy though we are in consultation with Dr. Aparna panda, delivery was planned in my home town and we had a stillborn during the surgery. However I got conceived again within 4 months after the surgery. I was very scared and confused as there was no adequate time for me to recover mentally and physically from my previous experience and I was diabetic at that time. We again consulted Dr. Aparna panda . The kind of support doctor has given us is unbelievable, all my fear was taken away. Doctor was mindful of my situation. She was always there for us through this entire pandemic, and finally we were blessed with a baby girl previous month. It feels so blessed to have a doctor who understands your problems, taking control of all the situations, treating you accordingly. Without any doubt Doctor,  you have brought all the happiness back to our home and we will be forever great full for your service.
reply_text: Dear patient, it was a pleasure taking care of you and was very happy giving you a healthy outcome in end.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We have been consulting with Dr Aparna from last 10 months and she is very friendly, approachable, responsive and helpful. Our main concern was to deliver baby through NVD, in Bangalore we heard most doctors are suggesting C-Section (in my Society 9 out of 11 are C-sections), but after meeting Dr. Aparna we realize NVD is possible and she took 100% guarantee for it and my wife delivered baby through NVD. she had never prescribed any unnecessary scan or medicine also, during labor pain my wife gave up and decided to take Epidural analgsia (which reduce labor pain, cost is Approx. 12 to 14K INR), but Aparna mem had convinced her and brought back her confidence. She is always responding over phone without any time constraint. During labor pain she responded our whats up message early morning 05:00 AM and helped us and given instruction until ambulance arrived. Aparna mem had kept us positive until my wife delivered baby through NVD.
before delivery we were in tension how we are going to handle everything alone but she helped us in each and every aspect. In Rainbow hospital also, she used visit us twice in day and spent few minutes with and guided with right Approaches to get well soon and also inquired Medical staff with Dose and way of taking medicine every time.
Special Thank you Aparna mem without your expert guidance this would not as easy as it happened.
reply_text: Thanks for the detailed feedback. Congratulations on your wife's normal delivery

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Obstetrics / Antenatal Care,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,
review: I started consulting Dr.Aparnaa from my 5th month of pregnancy. Mine was an IVF pregnancy with known hypothyroidism under treatment and gastritis. She guided me throughout my pregnancy through what's app also whenever needed, she continously monitored my TSH and other necessities and prescribed medications as needed. When I had to go through a C-section she gave me confidence and support and relived me from all my fears, she came to my room and made sure I get up and walk and am able to do my daily routine without any difficulty before she left for the day (on the day of my surgery), now that's dedication, I don't know how many doctors have that personal touch. Today after a month, I am very happy and healthy with my newborn baby girl and I am able to care for her on my own, my wound has healed well. I feel blessed to have been under the care of Dr.Aparnaa Panda. She is a doctor who truly understands her patients needs and knows what she is doing, she doesn't do anything that is unnecessary. I strongly recommend Dr.Aparnaa Panda, you can close your eyes and follow her instructions, I am sure you will not regret because you are for sure in safe hand's.
reply_text: Thanks for the strong recommendation Pavitra. Happy motherhood. Also wishing you a great family life.

tags: None
review:
I consulted Dr Aparna 7 years back when i was diagnosed with PCOD, I was completely depressed when i came to know about PCOD since i was planning for a baby. But doctor assured me that it is a small and common problem these days and said it will be cured in no time. I started taking the medicine and i got pregnant after 2 months. Thanks to doctor, now my son is 6 years old. For my second pregnancy, without any doubt i went to Dr Aparna again as she had gained my confidence 100%.This time i had PCOD and Thyroid  issue. Now my 7th month is going on and i trust her blindly. She gives her phone number to her patients and will respond immediately to any query you ask

I strongly recommend Dr Aparna because she diagnoses the problem immediately and you can see the result within no time.  Dr Aparna explains everything clearly and she is ready to repeat it n number of times as it is very important to follow the dates and figures in pregnancy. She is very friendly and treats you like a family member. The love and assurance which she gives will cure half of the problems.
Looking forward to deliver my second baby safe and sound.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Visited for my 1st pregency and my experience was good. Consulted for my whole pregency and delivered a healthy baby boy through c session (Tried for normal delivery but due to my weight and gestational diabetes I failed) in rainbow hospital. In first trimester I was suffering full morning sickness and not able to have food but thanks to mam it controlled with in one day after the 1st day of my consultation. I was overweight and had history of miscarriage, High blood pressure and PCOS but my journey was smooth because of mam. I followed her instructions and it controlled with only diet. She always tries to give less medications and unnecessary tests.Found gestational diabetes in 7 months but it controlled with only diet, did not take any medication. Strongly recommending aaparna mam's clinic. Specially thanks to her clinic staffs they are very friendly and co-operative. Mam responded my late night ( 2.00 am) queries too. She took care of me till my delivery. Thank you for all your love support and care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I looked for lot of gynecologist in Bangalore and Dr Aparna was the one I chose to visit. Visited the doctor, explained all the symptoms to the doctor and doctor gave a lot of tests to be done which is good, none of the tests were unwanted, based o ln the symptoms required tests suggested by the doctor was done to isolate the issue I had and finally i was made aware of the fact that I had 2 large fibroids.Doctor explained everything very clearly on what are the next steps to be taken and also suggested us to take 2nd opinions if we were not comfortable with docs diagnosis.We finally decided to have the fibroids removed by surgery and consulted doctor with our decision. We did not want to go elsewhere because of the fact that Dr Aparna was straight forward on the approach. The surgery was also performed by the doctor with very good care and we were visited by the doctor frequently before and post surgery also. Very happy with the service and the way doctor interacts with patients.I've seen lot of mixed reviews given to this doc for unwanted tests/medicine etc but i being in the field understand the importance of tests to diagnose the issue correctly and for the cure. Don't blindly trust negative reviews, i would suggest visit this doctor first.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was new to Bangalore and I was so confused regarding where to go and which doctor to be consulted because Pregnancy period is the most important phase in life. Finding Dr. Aparnaa Panda ma’am may not be the destiny but I feel like it’s all pre-ordained. From the day 1 of my visit to Aparnaa Women’s clinic, I have never had any issue with the doctor or the staff till today. 

I have seen many of the pregnant women around me and in my relatives who have taken bundle of medicines on a daily basis and hectic appointment schedules with which, they got fed up. But in my pregnancy, Dr. Aparna Panda ma’am made sure that nutrition is given naturally, not with medicines. I’m really glad about that. 

Dr.Aparnaa Panda ma’am encouraged me for the normal delivery and helped me with the exercises which needs to be done in order to have a normal delivery. She also travelled with me through out the pregnancy period and was there for all my questions and doubts. 

I recommend Dr.Aparnaa Panda ma’am to whom are in need. 

Thank you Ma’am.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr Aparna is so cheerful, friendly n super energetic even though she has such a hectic schedule. I visited Doc for my second pregnancy. I delivered a baby girl on December 10th.I got to know about Dr. Aparna from practo n decided to consult her after seeing multiple positive reviews. Doc advised me convenient diet to avoid putting on extra calories. She never prescribed unwanted medicines. Due to some medical emergency, I had to undergo a c section at 38th week. Doc calmly explained the need of emergency c section and risks of vaginal delivery in such a case. Though I was taken aback aftr getting to know emergency c section but doc really handled the situation well. Doc was so supportive and encouraging during the procedure and post delivery. She used to visit me daily during my stay at the hospital. Doc encouraged me to start walking for speedy recovery, feed my baby on egular intervals and slowly return to my normal routine. Doc was upset more than I was for undergoing c section as my first delivery was normal delivery and doc expected the second one also to be normal.Doc is always available at calls and wats app to answer ones's queries.Doc is a gem and I highly recommend this doc.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ******* ***** ** *** **** ************ ****. I am writing a detailed post because I feel the doctor and her whole team deserves it. We were planning to start a family but I had some issues with my cycles and thyroid also. I am 34 years old. We had consulted some other Doctors but had not felt comfortable with the process. We met doctor Panda after going through online reviews and were never disappointed. She appears strict but has clear diagnosis of the issues, tells things to you as it is and aims to put you on the right direction immediately. She helped us conceive even with my history of menstrual disorder and thyroid issue and that too without any IVF treatment. She prescribes necessary interventions and medications only. In the 4th month of my pregnancy she noticed I had a short cervix and immediately advised us to go for cervical cerclage to minimise any risk to my pregnancy. Although she placed me on complete bed rest since the 4th month of my pregnancy she always kept my spirit high and infact her monitoring helped me lose weight during pregnancy negating many risk factors. I am happy' to say I had an absolutely healthy pregnancy all thanks to Dr Panda who took all the right decisions throughout my pregnancy. We were blessed with a baby girl few days back with normal delivery and we owe it to Dr Panda. We have never seen such a dedicated doctor with so much passion towards her job. Thanks a ton ma'am.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We were trying to conceive for 4 months without getting any positive result. So we search for the best gynecologist near me and luckily first name that popped up is Dr Aparna Panda. Without any delay we fixed an appointment and in our first visit my wife went through some blood tests and USG scan and we came to know that she had PCOS. So mam diagnosed it prescribed some medicines to take and advised to perform some regular exercise and walking. To our surprise, you won't believe when we visited for the next time after 30 days, we visited with the positive news that my wife got conceived! Thanks a lot Mam for appearing as an angel in our life and  make it possible in such a short duration! The diagnosis process that is perform by Dr Aparna Panda very precise, she described very well what is the cause of the problem and obviously result of the treatment is awesome! We are going through regular check-up during this pregnancy phase and it is going fine. Everything blood tests, USG are performed under the same hood. We are really grateful to Dr. Aparna and all the staffs who supported us through out this journey. So if anyone facing any issue related to pregnancy(gyne issue), definitely I will recommend to have a visit.
reply_text: Congratulations Sir

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We came to know about Dr. Aparna from Practo review. We visited her for regular pregnancy checkups. *** ***** ********** *********** ***** ** ********** She would patiently listen to me and only after that would explain me things clearly.  I am extremely grateful that I found this doctor. 

I was very satisfied by her treatment but had to come back to native place in the 8th month.

We regret our decision of leaving Bangalore and coming to native place for delivery.  We would have stayed there and continued treatment with Dr. Aparna. Everything was going smooth when I was with her but things totally changed when we came to our native place. 

There were complications, we consulted many doctors but none of them was like Dr. Aparna. Last 2 months of pregnancy were most painful and frustrated months for me. 

Finally, I gave birth to a baby boy on July 28th. 

I am extremely grateful that I found this doctor. I would strongly recommend her to everyone. I am sure you will like her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Maternal Care/ Checkup,Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Tests,Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,
review:
We consulted Aparna Mam for our first child. After first couple of visits we were sure we will continue with her till the end.  Doctor understands all our problems and needs, listens patiently and explains all aspects.  She is straight forward, to the point and very affectionate.  You can ask her whatever doubts you have though it may be very silly, she always answers those gently. After few visits we generated a family type connection.

The entire pregnancy and delivery period we were alone in the city with no family support due to the ongoing covid pandemic. Mam supported us both by health and mentally like a family member. During delivery hospitalisation she made sure that our tenure at hospital is smooth and post delivery she followed up from her side to make sure I am doing good which hardly any doctor does.

Whenever I am concerned or was nervous on Hospital bed, she was there and trust me when I see her I gain more confidence  and feel energetic. Thank you Mam for being there during all these tough times and for taking good care of me. Your contribution in our lives, we will always cherish.

For aspirant parents we will suggest, just trust Mam, follow her each words and forget everything else. You are in very good hands and she will make sure for the best result.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
** ****** ***** ** *** ** *** **** ******* ** **** **** **** ****** * **
Pushed for normal delivery. Have been consulting her from the time we found out about my pregnancy. She has been an excellent guide and doctor from the start of the pregnancy till the delivery. Never prescribed any unnecessary medications/ blood tests or scans. Always spoke to the point and never scared us with any negativity . Was always positive. Got the delivery done at Rainbow Hospitals Bangalore. She made sure that she herself came in to do the delivery no matter the time. She pushed me to go for a normal delivery and I myself asked her to do a C section. The entire team of doctors and sisters at Rainbow hospital have been completely supportive. They motivated me and finally made up my mind to go for normal delivery with Epidural. Epidural really helped. Special thanks to Dr Aparna for making our dream come true and being there for us throughout. God bless :) 
We definitely recommend Dr Aparna and Rainbow hospitals . It was an amazing experience throughout 😊
reply_text:
Thank you so much Shanthala for coming all the way from electronic city to Rainbow hospital Bannerghatta Road for your safe confinement. 
If you hadn't given me a chance, there was no way I could have given u such a positive experience. 
It was very challenging to give you a vaginal birth, but God was with us and helped your body and baby adjust with each other, so that the near impossible could be made possible. 
Many congratulations on your normal delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I do not write reviews generally, but writting this time in the hope of helping someone else.
I met Aparnaa Mam in the month of June 2020 (peak of covid) as I was bleeding continuously from 10 days. Didn't knew the cause, just thought of some hormonal imbalance due to my hectic job.
First day itself she suspected something wrong and ordered few test. To my surprise I was pregnant, but my happiness didn't last long as it turned out to be ectopic pregnancy. The way she handled my case is truly amazing. When I myself was not aware of the intensity of the word "ectopic", she literally saved my life.

Me and my husband were worried to try next time, but after her reassurance we gave it a try and conceived within 2 months. And now after a year of meeting her, I am with my little angel in June 2021.
My entire journey went smooth with her. She focuses on health, diet busting all conventional myths, resulting in no complications, and a normal delivery. 
She is always responsive, gives timely support and very well knows about what she is doing. ** *********** ***** ** ********** 

I highly recommend her if you are planning your pregnancy in banglore.
reply_text:
Kritika, thankyou so much for staying with me during the bad phase of you life in which you had an ectopic pregnancy and also the good phase of a health pregnancy and a natural(normal) delivery.
I thank God for giving me such nice and understanding patients who understand how much hardwork we put for getting  positive outcome. It is not easy to be available 24/7 both offline during all emergencies and while attempting normal deliveries and online in whatsapp replying to our patients but I definitely try my best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My journey started with Dr Aparna in the year 2019 ,as we were in a way of family planning .She guided us with a right process and in the year 2020 September I conceived ,Since it was a twin pregnancy it was high risk and she made sure that everything goes well till end. She was more of like a elder sister who guided us well with her knowledge and experience that she has gained in years. As I was little overweight she was strict with my diet ,amount of rest to be taken. Her medication was accurate and she has asked to take only necessary test and scan. Here I would like to quote .."Becos she was strict with me, my total weight gain was 9kg and I was able to deliver healthy babies without any complications and I would say please follow whatever she says that too blindly and believe me you will be thanking her as I am doing right now." During my complete pregnancy she was calm and was always available to answer my queries .Her explanation regarding my queries were scientific and  logical.  About her clinic ,it was well sanitised ,social distancing was maintained.She was always on WhatsApp to answer my queries and on call as well. I would high recommend Dr Aparna for your complete pregnancy time,as I have consulted many gynaecologist ** ***** *** ** *** **** *Thank u mam for making us parents of two twin girls and making my pregnancy journey smooth.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It's an immense pleasure to say that I delivered a healthy baby girl 2 weeks ago and all credits to Dr. Aparnaa Panda. She was a great guide *** ** ********* ****** *** guided me to manage my diet and diabetes during my pregnancy. I was diagnosed with diabetes during my first pregnancy which had to be terminated after 15 weeks due to high blood sugars.

With such a diabetic condition, getting pregnant and delivering a child was a dream for us. I was over weight too. It was only Dr. Aparnaa Panda who insisted me to continue my pregnancy the second time and I am very happy that I trusted her. The results are in front of me today.

Since day one, she helped me maintain my sugars and manage my weight and gave me positive vibes to stay calm and relaxed. I might have irritated her with my doubts, but she never lost her patience and responded to me with a happy and cheerful face.

I think she is the first doctor I have seen, who cares and responds to each patient on what's app and guided further. Many doctors suggested me not to conceive until I lose weight and bring down my sugars. But only she supported me through out my pregnancy to continue.

I suggest and highly recommend her to every women out there who have been struggling with their health issues or have problems being parents. Trust me, once u visit her, u will never regret your decision
reply_text:
I am happy that you were not discouraged with your initial very high HbA1C reports and previous history of abortion and decided to continue the pregnancy. 

You were very careful about your diet throughout the pregnancy and  you deserve to be the proud mother of your beautiful daughter. 

Congratulations!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This review is a small reward of gratitude to Dr. Aparna Panda. A similar review helped us to find her when we were clueless on whom to visit, especially during the pandemic situation. Our first appointment booking through phone call made us feel at ease, when they said about the guidelines they follow due to the pandemic. Friendly nature of the staff members made us feel like we chose the right hospital. After meeting the doctor, her kind words added more confidence to handle the initial stages of pregnancy at ease. Her prescription of minimal tablets made us pass through all the stages of pregnancy with confidence. Easy appointment bookings and punctual consultations with the doctor made us feel relaxed all through the pregnancy.  Her words always encouraged and added courage to do all my day to day works as usual with the baby in the womb. Her amiable nature made us feel free to clarify all the doubts that I had on diet, exercise, and everything regarding pregnancy. She used to connect with us personally and give suggestions on fully understanding us and prescribe medicines based upon our own need. We heart fully thank her for all the support she provided.
reply_text: Many thanks for the kind words. So sweet of you to let me know that I contributed significantly to your pregnancy journey. It truly put me in tears of joy and appreciation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I fully recommend the doctor for pregnancy related consultations and delivery services, especially for normal delivery. Actually I had recently shifted to Bangalore and was pregnant. I was quite concerned as to finding a right doctor for consultation and guidance. I did some research via internet to identify the best doctor in the city. As a result, I decided to visit Dr Aparnaa Panda, who to my luck turned out to be a super doctor, a great advisor, mentor and above all acted as a guardian, which I needed most in the city completely new to me. The very first interaction with her was enough for me to continue consultation with her. Throughout the pregnancy period, I kept visiting her clinic i.e. Aparnaa Women's Clinic which I found to be a single stop solution for all pregnancy related issues. Staffs thereof were quite polite, amicable and helpful. Dr Panda was always there (24*7) for any queries and doubts. She provided a very personal care throughout. Each conversation with Dr Panda freed me from stresses and the whole experience became joyful. Everything went smoothly. I am blessed with a baby through normal delivery. Extremely thankful to Dr Panda!!
reply_text: Many thanks for the trust you had in me. Despite the complications I was professionally satisfied to help you with a normal delivery.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am 24 yr old female and I was diagnosed with PCOS 5 years ago. After been on the prescribed birth control pills on and off for these many years I decided to come off the pills and take control over my health with professional help. Unfortunately, the biggest disappointment I had from Dr. Aparna was that when I mentioned this she straight away said that I have to be on pill until I plan on conceiving and also because I am sexually active. She didn't educate me about any of the side effects these birth control pills, **** * *** **** ******* * **** *** ***** **** ***** when I had asked her about taking supplements like vitamins, zinc, magnesium ***** *** ****** ** **** **** ***** **** ******* **** *** ********* she just laughed it off and didn't help. She clearly told me that PCOS cannot be controlled like this which is absolutely not right , infact the paper she handed me about PCOS stated clearly it can be controlled with strict diet and lifestyle. * ***** *** ********* *** ** *** ***** ***** ********* **** **** ** ******* *** ***** *** ***** **** **** *** ****** ***** **** ****** ***** ** **** *******
reply_text:
Its not nice of you to thank me thrice face to face in my clinic and then write a u turn review. 
Had explained everything to u including that you have a lean (thin) PCO. U are already doing all with diet and lifestyle. Since you have irregular cycles tablet cyproterone benefits of preventing an unwanted pregnancy far outweigh the any theoretical side effects that you are unlikely to get.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We visited Dr. Aparna Panda's clinic during third trimester. *** ** ****** *** **** ************* I can say she is Epitome of positivity.
We consulted for certain apprehensions we had with the progress of pregnancy and my Hb level was not raising inspite of taking  medications. Timely recommendation of test and medicine helped me to overcome it. She handled it so well that after first visit to her clinic I started feeling positive. 

She carefully understands the history and provides best possible advice. 

We are indeed happy that we made the right choice by consulting her. 
As my due date was nearing I was more worried but she suggested me to be patient and wait till the due date. Just 3 days before my due date I got labor pain at home. I dropped her a msg in the midnight and she promptly responded the very next morning and I was in hospital. She guided the staff and the whole process was smooth. Throughout she never let me panic. Now I have been blessed with baby boy by normal delivery. 

I specially have to mention that she was available during this pandemic situation. 

My sincere thanks and gratitude to doctor.
reply_text: We need kind people like you with a positive approach towards life in this covid pandemic. Many thanks for trusting me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: First of all, apologies for the delayed feedback. Thanks a lot Dr. Aparnaa Panda for all the care, medication and guidance throughout the 9 months of pregnancy. I delivered a healthy baby girl through normal delivery at 38 weeks at Rainbow Hospital, Bannerghatta Road. I called the doctor at 11.30 pm due to sudden water break. Since then  Dr. Aparnaa guided the staff very well for inducing pain and I delivered the baby next day afternoon and Dr. reached on time and process was smooth. Before being pregnant, I had severe back pain but thanks to doctor that my pregnancy had been smooth due to her medications. *** ***** ********** ******** ***** ** ************She never encourage you to see the bad side of things if you face any problem during pregnancy nor provide unnecessary information to make you panic. She is upfront and sometimes I felt difficult to talk to her. However, you need to understand that she had to work day & night to serve you and you should be patient with her sometimes.l am very thankful to her to be available for me during this pandemic & gave us the best gift of our life. I highly recommend her. Will meet you once things gets better.
reply_text: Congratulations for your normal delivery

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
We visited Dr. Aparnaa in a critical situation, where my wife fluid level was very low and due to which baby growth got down. We consulted with two famous and popular hospitals in Bangalore both hospitals had confirmed for c-section early delivery. 
That was a very difficult situation for both of us. ** ******** ** ****** *** *** **** ************ *** **** ***** *** ******* ***** *** ************. She explains to us all medical aspects to get normal delivery even fluid level is low and suggested some medication. After three weeks of consultation with her fluid level get increased but the baby growth was still down and till the time 37 weeks got completed, so she suggested to deliver baby in 38-week it-self due to baby growth concern. 
We decided to go with her suggestion. Now we have a healthy baby girl by normal delivery.
She is a highly professional gynecologist and gives enough time to each patient. She is very friendly and makes the patient comfortable so that the patient can explain his/her problems. We are very thankful to her and will always recommend her to others. In one word I can say Dr. Aparnaa is a specialist in high-risk pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been visiting Dr. Aparnaa since I was in the second month of my pregnancy and I must say this was one of the best decisions. I was looking for someone experienced easily available when needed and she was the right choice. Whenever required she is been available on WhatsApp. Today I am blessed with a baby boy through normal delivery on 7th. She made my journey very smooth and positive. Right from the beginning she kept her consultations short crisp and clear and always encouraged me to stay positive and Happy. I am a working woman and she always encouraged me to work till the end which I did . I chose rainbow based on her advice and she ensured she was available throughout during my delivery which happened late night. She is experienced, approachable, prefers and tries her best for normal delivery even in complicated situations, doesn't prescribe unnecessary medications and always encourages you to be positive and stay happy which is very much required. Work on her advises if you want to have normal delivery and smooth pregnancy. I would recommend her to everyone who are looking for one of the best doctors during their pregnancy as it is very difficult to find someone so professional experienced and friendly doctor like her. I and my family are very thankful to her for her extended support.
reply_text: Thanks for giving me a chance to take care of you and help you have a normal delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Aparna Panda, the only reason we first visited was she was near to my home and had good reviews online. We thought we will just consult and see else we will change.But when we met her first time we decided we will stick to her and we never went for a second opinion. Her confidence in her field and attitude tells it all. I had 1 early miscarriage before and that doctor missed something really important, but Dr Aparna without even complaining or telling bad about that doctor treated with the right attitude. When we visited her we were trying from couple of months but was unsuccessful, with her guidance I conceived within 3 weeks of my visit.She knows when to be strict and when to be soft with her patients. At times I used to feel she is being very strict but ultimately it was for my benefit only. She always tries to minimize patient's expenses on visits and reports unlike other doctors, in my case she reduced hospital stay also by 2 days. She was available 24*7 for any kind of doubts in these 9 months. She has been very cooperative.I would recommend her to all my family & friends who ever plans to be mommy or any other gynac issues. Thanks Doctor for everything during this 9 month of pregnancy! I gave birth to a baby girl this week.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Me an my wife have been consulting Dr. Aparna for our pregnancy. We are very very satisfied with our interactions with Dr. Aparna. The fact that Care Diagnostics has all the necessary scanning and blood/urine test arrangements at the clinic makes it even more easier to deal with the process. *** ** ******** *** **** ***** ** ********** **** **** *** she is affiliated with the Rainbow Hospital in Bannerghatta road which is top notch and which is where we had our baby delivered. Ours was a little complicated case since around 34th week the baby position had lowered. Dr. Aparna adviced us to follow strict bed rest because she was determined to avoid preterm labour and ensure that the baby atleast stay in the woumb till the 37-40 weeks. However due to some complications the mother experienced a sudden placenta rupture due to which we had to go for a c-section as a final measure. Dr. Aparna was available in the Rainbow hospital at very short notice and the surgery was performed at 5 am.  Both baby and mother are doing well :) We are very thankful for Dr. Aparna and her entire staff at Care Diagnostics  as well all to all the support staff and doctors at the Rainbow hospital for the necessary help, precaution and support to have a succesful and healthy pregnancy!

review:
We landed up at Aparna Clinic solely based on Google and Practo.com reviews of Dr. Aparna Panda. She has been our go-to Gynecologist in Bangalore and we have been visiting her Clinic since June last year. 

We were planning for a baby since the start of 2017, then it came to light that my wife has the Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome.  We tried homeopathy and Ayurveda treatments at our hometown, but the situation did not improve. 

My wife was on medications suggested by Dr Aparna since June 2017. This year starting January, Doctor recommended IUIs to help speed up the process, as my wife's ovulation was not consistent. Dr. Aparna checked all the options before recommending IUIs, and we are thankful to Dr. Aparna that my wife was able to conceive in Februrary this year. Now we are at the 26th week of pregnancy, and do visit Aparna clinic on a monthly basis for checkups. This is a very exciting time for us, all thanks to Dr. Aparna and her diligent treatment process that made us believe that PCOS is also a solvable problem. 

Thank you Doctor for all the care at your clinic.

Kind Regards,
Abhilash Nair
reply_text:
Thanks Abhilash and Anushree for your valuable detailed feedback.
Yes PCO can be kept in control to help you conceive with simple medication.
I would like to clarify here that I don't give IUI (intrauterine insemination treatment) and I have given you only ovulation induction treatment and not done IUI.

review: We initially went to Dr Aparna Panda in my third trimester. We had  plans of delivering the baby in our home town  or else we would have consulted her right in the beginning of my pregnancy. Consulting Dr Aparna Panda was a wise decision. She won us over then and there by not only patiently listening to us but also by not prescribing any unnecessary tests. Anyone who has been through that phase would understand how mentally challenging those times can be and having a doctor who is comforting and at the same time honest with you is the best thing that can happen to you. Dr Aparna has always listened to us patiently and ensured that all our questions are answered. In case of any emergency, she was always available even on Whatsapp. The best thing we liked about her was that she made it a point to never scare us, no matter the situation. She gave us quite a few tips to ensure normal delivery.  However, due to certain circumstances, we had to get our baby delivered through C-Sec. She kept me stress free all along while still ensuring that I realized what I needed to do. A very caring attitude and always a smile on her face. I would say she is now as much of a friend to me as she is my doctor. Thanks to her, we had a cute baby boy delivered a couple of weeks back. I would recommend her to anyone in a heartbeat.

review:
I have to say that I was just lucky to find her. It was my second pregnancy after a gap of 7 years and hence I had enough pointers to compare how I was being treated as compared to the previous one.
She not only helped me sail through the tenure with loads of confidence, personal care and advice, but also handled all my tantrums with a warm-friendly smile. I was treated as a family, but she was strict when it was needed. The turning point was when I landed in hospital in an emergency C-Section at midnight and refused to go to OT without seeing her face. It was easy for the on-duty staff to put my case on hold by giving me pain killers, but she rushed to the hospital past midnight and operated me. I delivered a healthy little angel at 1:30am and was so very thankful to her. I had heard several cases where emergency on-duty doctors operated at the last moment. I had so much faith and confidence in Aparnaa that I would not move an inch without seeing her face. The moment I saw her with a big broad smile and held her hand just before moving to OT, I knew I was fearless. She handled me like a kid both pre, during and post surgery. A BIG BIG THANK-YOU doctor Aparnaa. You and your gestures will remain forever in my memories and our entire family is grateful to you.

Upon the home pregnancy test coming positive for my wife, we were a little anxious (being our first time) to find a good Gynaecologist and get started with the medical consultation. A little help from Google and after reading through patient reviews & feedbacks posted online, we zeroed down to Dr.Aparnaa's clinic . The location of the clinic is easily accessible for people who stay in areas like BTM Layout, Bilekahalli, Bannerghatta road, Arekere, Hulimavu etc.
Our feedback based on our interactions at the clinic, as well with Dr.Aparnaa so far...
-Good ambience and professional front office staff.
-The doctor is always on time, she makes efforts to lighten up the conversations, replied to all our queries and apprehensions in a simple and effective manner, which we believe significantly helps in building the confidence level of an would be mother. No unnecessary tests and medicines were prescribed and clear-cut advice was provided w.r.t diet and other precautions from the first consultation itself.
-Scanning facility is also available at the clinic and the doctor herself does the scans, which is definitely a convenience.
-Reaching out to the doctor hasn't been a hassle so far.
It is a leap of faith for us and we are praying everything goes well, we are expecting our first child in March 18'. We hope this review is helpful for people looking out for a reliable Women's clinic.
Thanks,
Sarthak & Sulgna

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Its been more than one year journey with Aparana doctor , initially we consulted the doctor while we were planning for pregnancy and we had couple of complication  after multiple flow-up / scanning /medications finally after 6 month i was conceived. 

The medication and flowup they did was so good . Doctor responded to all our query during the consultation and if there any medical emergency doctor was available over the phone anytime ..

After conceiving  we were hoping for the normal delivery and also the track record of normal delivery by Aparna doctor was very good .. 

During the pregency period she took good care by doing regular scanning/blood test  and provided medications based in the reports .

At the 8th month due to food infection ( Outside junk food) we had severe 
vomitting and doctor suggested for three bottles of drips after which vomitting got reduced.
And during the 9 month after general scanning doctor the stomach of baby was little big .. By doubting it doctor suggested for blood test and in which sugar levels was bit high for normal delivery was quite difficult at that time . 

In the next day had a severe pains and got admitted to Rainbow hospital it was almost night 10:30 duty doctor did a NST and shared the reports to doctor Aparna , the pulse rate of the baby was less than 100 which was difficult for normal delivery and we had a call with Aparna doctor and agreed to keep in observation for some more time there was a severe pain and doctor suggested for Epidural injection for painless delivery and was in a continues observation .
It was around 7:30 i think doctor Aparna came for the check and did internal checkup as she observed bleeding and started with the delivery procedures and final it was like a film climax everything was too fast and it was a baby boy with Normal delivery .

Sincerily Thanks for my favourite doctor Aparna Panda  and rainbow staff :)
reply_text:

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
For the first two visits it was awesome, during our third visit on 8th Oct 2017 a scan was done and the Dr. Aparna Panda mentioned that the growth of the foetus was fine. On 9th Oct 2017 my wife noticed the spotting as this is normal in some cases we just ignored it and tried to get in touch with Dr. Aparna Panda but couldn't get in touch with her as she was busy, then we consulted our doctor in our home town she helped us out and we didn't visit the clinic of Dr. Panda as my wife didn't want to take the risk of travelling as she was afraid of bleeding more.  When my wife noticed blood spot again on 11th Oct 2017 in the morning she decided to visit Dr. Panda and when she did the scanning Dr. Panda came to the conclusion that the heartbeat of the baby has stopped. This is the same doctor who said everything is fine on 8th Oct 2017. She asked us get admitted in Rainbow Hospital and gave us a list of lab tests and asked us to give the samples at her clinic as it is cost effective as compared to Rainbow Hospital charges. She asked us to get admitted by between 2pm-4pm as we needed time to make arrangements for our elder kid. We have the insurance and to be on a safer side we wanted to know what would be an approximate cost for the abortion, Dr. Panda said that it would be around 40,000 to 50,000. When we were preparing to go to Dr. Panda's clinic my wife started bleeding heavily and we tried to get in touch with the doctor she didn't show any concern and asked to visit Rainbow Hospital directly. That day it was raining very heavily in bangalore and our cab got stuck in front of  Hospital in Dollars Colony. It is in this  Hospital that we got to know that it has been a while since the growth of the baby has stopped *** *** **** ** *** *** **** ********* **** *********** *** when I spoke to Dr. Panda she was more concerned about why did we go to that Hospital and not Rainbow and was also concerned about a document which was supposed to be submitted to her was with us  she was least bothered about her patient's well being. May be our time was bad, this may be a one odd case.
Anyways my wife is doing fine and we have no complains against anyone.
reply_text:
I think the summary of your story is that I have been unfriendly with you and your wife? 
I had explained to you that your wife might start bleeding at anytime and to please get her admitted immediately. But you refused because the cost of hospitalisation was 22,000 without blood tests, medicines and consumables and 32,000 including the previously mentioned charges. Please remember that you are talking about a standard and reputed hospital whose charges are fixed and can be clarified at anytime by the billing section whose phone no I had  provided to you  at 11am of 11th Oct 2017, when you had come to my clinic. The cost is not 40,000 to 50,000 as what you have mentioned.
For you, her condition was not important, and you wanted to do the procedure in your hometown.  Also, you  took away from my clinic, a very important paper, which I need to submit to the DHO, instead of handing it over to my receptionist.
I requested you to atleast do all her  baseline blood test done asap so that if she comes as an emergency, providing her the lifesaving procedures will be faster.  
At around 5 pm , you called me up and said the she was bleeding and you yourself asked me whether you should come to the clinic or the hospital with your wife.
It is then that I asked you , how is her condition and how much is the bleeding? 
When you said that the bleeding is more I asked you a few other questions and found out that her condition must be stable, so I said that you can come to hospital so that  immediate lifesaving procedure like starting an IV line can be started. This was at 5pm.
Again I called you up at 6 30pm and then again at 7 45 pm  because you reached neither the clinic, nor the hospital till then and kept on saying that you were on the way.
At 8pm, U called me yourself and told me , " Dr Aparnaa, it is done, we have admitted ***********( your wife's name)."
I was surprised and I asked how did you get admitted so soon, because just 15 min back, you said you were still on the way.
That is when you said that you had got admitted in another hospital which I am also attached to. It is then that I asked you to tell me clearly name of the hospital that you were admitted in.
Please remember that I had called you up again and again and asked why you have not reached and how your wife was doing despite me being busy with my patients in my OPD.
After you mention that you have got admitted under some other doctor, it is unethical on  my part to interfere in her treatment.
It is then that I requested you to return the important document back into my clinic.
Anybody who reads this can conclude that while you kept on making me wait for you to come on a rainy day, you were actually bargaining for a reduced rate in a nearby hospital which does not have ICU facilities to take care of your wife as compared to the cost effective hospital which I had suggested you. 
Also to set the records straight, however busy I am, I am always available on phone for all emergencies and in whatsapp to clear all doubts.
I dont know what you want to achieve by misinterpreting and omitting many important events in your story.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
First of all, thanks a lot ma'am for making our family complete and sorry for posting review so late.
I have been consulting Aparnaa ma'am for last 2 years since i was diagnosed with hypothyroid and minor prolactinoma. But despite all these complications, I conceived naturally just because of her guidance. When we decided to have a baby, our primary concern was to deliver a baby through NVD. From 1st month of pregnancy until delivery, Aparnaa ma'am guided us throughout each stage. She always welcomed us with a bright smile, which made us feel positive and confident and listened to all our small queries, which we came across. I simply followed her invaluable medical advice and as a result, i had a smooth and healthy pregnancy. She always insisted on eating healthy food rather than taking unwanted medications. Moreover, she always responded to queries whenever needed no matter what the time it is, which is truly appreciated. Under her able guidance, i had a normal delivery. We blessed with a baby boy on 23rd May.
On 22nd May, i visited ma'am for my last pregnancy checkup and that day ma'am told us that my amniotic fluid level wasn't sufficient and so the delivery cannot be delayed. We went for RT PCR test immediately since i was told to get admitted to the hospital the moment i received my covid report. But my baby had his own plans. My labor pain started on 22nd May around 1pm after i returned to my home. I reached at the hospital at 6:30pm. The pain got intense around 7pm. Around 12:30am,I was only 7cm dilated. Despite my insufficient amniotic fluid level and excessive bleeding, Aparnaa ma'am tried her best to deliver my baby normally. But my cervix wasn't ready to be dilated more. At last, ma'am Decided to go for C-Section. I was shifted to OT. Ma'am checked my cervix for the last time. And surprisingly, i was fully dilated by then. Ma'am was so happy and she decided to go for vacuum delivery. At last, my baby was delivered through NVD thanks to ma'am. I would like to say thanks to the team of Rainbow Hospital who took care of me and my baby very well.
In a nutshell, her calm demeanor, expertise, and experience make her patients feel assured that they are in the safest hands. We are happy and satisfied to have Aparnaa ma'am in our lives because of which my pregnancy ended on a happy note.

review:
We had very great experience with Dr. Aparna madam and  she  did Normal delivery successfully, which we felt impossible.

I would strongly recommend Dr. Aparna for Normal delivery and she is a masterpiece in Gynaecology and obstetrics. She is one of the most inspiring and admirable doctor i have ever seen.

In the seventh month we have visited Dr. Aparna madam (at care diagnostics)and she encouraged,  motivated & given enough confidence for normal delivery. After consulting her, there was no fear of C-Section. She has great commitment and patience.

I am extremely thankful to Dr. Aparna madam for taking right decisions at the right time during labor (40 hours of labor). Day and Night she was available for us  over phone calls, whatsapp and visited when required. No doctor would have waited for such long time in hospital.

After getting intense contractions we went to  Rainbow Hospital at night 1:30 A.m (27th march). and Aparna madam suggested to stay in observation room.
NST test was performed continuously to monitor baby health , even in the Midnight  3 am madam answered calls and given suggestions.

After 36 hours of labor, cervix was only 2 cm dilated.   very  less progress in dilation. Duty doctor suggested to go for C-section. We lost hope for normal delivery and in complete disappointment. Dr. Aparna was continuously monitoring , over phone calls with Nurse and duty doctor entire night from 11:30 pm to morning 7 :30 Am.

Suddenly Dr. Aparna came to hospital in the morning time and taken right decision & changed medications which helped for the dilation of cervix from 2cms to 10 cms & delivered baby successfully on March 28th.

Extremely happy with facilities provided by Rainbow hospital(Bannergatta road) & providing best infrastructure.
Baby health and my wife health were monitored  throughout the labor.

review:
We were trying for a baby from last 5 years. We have visited more than 10 hospitals, none of them could help us. Even after doing 1000 test, 100 of medicine nothing happened. After 2 continues miscarriage I almost gave up my hope. Then we met Dr Aparnaa Panda and discussed our issue. 
We followed her instruction and my wife could able to conceive in 1st month itself. Throughout pregnancy we have done very few testing and scanning.
The best thing is, now we have a full term baby and my wife had a normal delivery. That was beyond my expectation. 
She helped us in many ways and explained everything in details. She was responding our whatsapp message with in few minutes. I did not see any doctor, replying to whatsapp message at all.   
She is very professional at her work and at the same time very friendly to us.
Dr Aparnaa Panda Thanks a lot for all your help and support.

review:
I had a PCOS problem.we visited another doctor just before aparna Mam's consultation.But didn't get results for 3-4 month's.then we searched in Google for good Dr and near for our home.luckily we got aparna panda Mam's clinic in first priority.we visited Dr ,Dr diagnosed the exact problem of PCOS with some necessary test and provided the right medicine.Within one month I got conceived and continued the treatment Till 9th month. Delivered a boy baby on 16th July 2022.Thanks for the Dr and team in clinic and hospital for support untill the delivery.

would definitely recommend Dr Aparnaa Mam for all those who are pregnant and want normal delivery. She listens to you very calmly and encourage you for the normal vaginal delivery. Also she does not give too many medicines as some other doctors do.

also because of Aparna Di. The best thing about di is that she is always available anytime
of the day or night either on WhatsApp or call. Just waiting for my baby and will update the review.
To summarize, you can trust Aparna more than yourself or any other doctor.

Dr Aparna was the 1st doctor I consulted with during my pregnancy and I feel lucky that i met her. *** ** ** ******* friendly, confident and a great person. I had my own complications with high BP, but she handled my situation like a family. She was good in clearing all of my doubts i had during this pregnancy period and she shared her personal mobile number to stay in touch whenever i needed her.
 Due to my high blood pressure i had to deliver the baby in just 32 weeks by c-section. Initially i was nervous, but she assured me that nothing would go wrong. And now i have this lovely baby girl all because of her. The baby when born was just 1.9 kgs. But is absolutely healthy and fine after 1 month. I am also thankful to her to still be in touch even after 1 month, and share her experience with me how to take care of such a little baby...

review: I have been visiting Dr Aparnaa from past 1 year. We went to meet her for family planning. I was suffering from pcos. She saw my past health reports and asked me to conduct some more health checkups for both me and my husband. post that she gave a detailed analysis and asked me to reduce weight so that conceiving would be easy. In 3-4 months I conceived and blessed with a baby girl. I want to thank Dr Aparnaa for standing by our side and explained each process in detail. I can't thank her enough for encouraging me for the normal delivery as she waited for entire day for that. My family and me will always be grateful for all the happiness in our lives today.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: After going through the reviews, decided to visit Aparna mam for pregnancy check ups for my wife. All through the phase of pregnancy,  she was very friendly in addressing the queries, providing suggestions related to body weight, exercises,  medications etc. At times she used to respond to queries on whatsapp too. My wife's first delivery was cesarean and there is a speculation that second one would be cesarean too, but doctor was pretty confident on the normal delivery and in every visit she used to boost up and never ever spoke about cesarean. At the time of delivery too, my wife couldn't sustain the pains and insisted for C section, still she encouraged to give a try and finally blessed with a cute baby gal on Nov 16, 2021, rare case of VBAC( Vaginal Birth After Cesarean). Thanks would be a small word to convey and the way she responds, treats the patient is really awesome. Truly blessed.
reply_text: Thanks for sharing your story. It gave me great professional satisfaction to treat your wife and complete your family

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We are lucky to have found Dr Aparnaa, consulted her for my second pregnancy. We were worried as we had repeated unsuccessful pregnancies in recent years. In the first visit itself doctor put me on all right medications to keep the pregnancy safe. Every time we visited her she would do necessary scan or tests and reassured us that everything is fine. Her calm approach and encouraging positive words made us look forward to positive outcome. She would never communicate in a negative way that would scare us but always gentle in explaining what precautions need to be taken. She also spoke encouragingly on going for a normal delivery. Throughout the labor she monitored the progress closely and ensured that i had a Normal Delivery. She also supports epidural if you wish to for it. We cant thank Dr Aparnaa enough for her positive words, right treatment and normal delivery support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Our successful pregnancy journey has been with Dr Aparnaa Panda for almost 10 months now. Our baby was born last week normally (Full Term & NVD). She is a very professional doctor with a very good combination of caring & strict nature. She boosts patients' confidence a lot & also provides counselling to have a positive mindset. She always encourages natural ways e.g.; food, delivery process etc. She prescribes only bare minimum medicines, tests and makes sure patients do not get cost unnecessarily. We still remember her prescription one day that only had 3-4 types of fruits & veggies and no medicine at all. We are extremely blessed to have her in our pregnancy journey. We are more than happy to recommend Dr Aparnaa Panda to any couple who are going through or planning to go into their most exciting journey of being parents.
reply_text: It was a wonderful experience taking care of your wife and instilling self confidence in her through out her pregnancy and more so during her delivery. She was very brave during her delivery and also a fighter. She had normal delivery without use of any forceps or vaccuum. Congratulations on the birth of a happy more confident and self reliant mother of your healthy child. Happy Parenting.

review: Our overall experience with Aparnaa mam was good. We did full research and chose her for our pregnancy journey. From very beginning we knew that we are in safe hands. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I didn't recommend this doctor to anyone at all. I am a diabetic at the time I conceived so I was scared and had lot of doubts about mine and baby health condition going forward and also wanted to know if my baby will have any complications going forward, in the middle of the conversation she stopped me and asked me directly in a rude manner that if I need an abortion, I couldn't able to control myself and hardly able to control my tears after hearing that.
They were more worried about my mask coming down a bit while talking than my actual issue, in fact she scolded me for that. Neither I was comfortable with her *** *** ********** *** ***** *********** I ended up coming out with more fear and doubts. I never seen any doctor behaving this manner in my life.
reply_text:
I understand you are having a hard time with a less than 2 yr baby in hand and uncontrolled diabetes. We are all there to help you. But please don't target us for your misfortune. You have said very bad things about your previous doctor. And I have only explained why whatever she has done/told is correct.If after repeatedly telling you that it is safe to continue the pregnancy by me and your previous doctor too, u insist, then we have to ask you if you are willing to continue the pregnancy in the first place or not. Each patient is different and we have to know your preferences before we proceed.

We had a discussion for over 20 min. First 10 mins literally the mask kept coming down at the rate of more than 3 times per minute. After I explained to you that we operate on so many patients every day, and it is not safe to wear a mask in the same small consultation room that I am sitting..... without exaggeration, not even once your mask came down for the next 10 minutes. 

After entire conversation, just before leaving the room, you thanked me for the detailed information. I told you to continue with your previous doctor but you said you wanted to do all checkups in this pregnancy with me only because you stay nearby and your doctor did caesarean for you unnecessarily the first time. I again explained to you that maybe cesarean was required for you the last time because of uncontrolled diabetes and big baby to prevent shoulder dystocia.

There were no tears in your eyes and your entire story is made up.

This entire story shows what a difficult person you are. I also don't recommend such a patient to any doctor.

We are here to help you. But it's not nice to point fingers at us just because you are going through a rough period in your life.

On the very first visit just by looking at me she confirmed that I have PCOD which I was completely unaware of and didn’t knew that this is the root cause of my health issues. I had consulted few other doctors earlier but none identified my health issue and I had already struggled for one year by taking different medicines. After consulting Dr. Aparnaa within only 2 months of treatment I was able to conceive and delivered a healthy baby through normal delivery. I highly recommend Dr. Aparnaa she is bit strict and talks to the point. You can completely really on her advice and she will do what is best for you and the child.

review:
We Visited Dr Aparna Mam's clinic after my wife conceived in May 2019.
The Dr is very friendly and give good time to patient .
Our experience have been wonderful throughout the Pregnancy.
These 9 months passed very smoothly , all thanks to Aparna mam's advice and DO's and DONT's list
My Wife delivered a healthy baby girl on 07th Feb 2020 through Normal delivery.

Thanks a lot Aparna mam for making us Proud parent of Healthy Baby Girl . 

Below are  Pro's and Cons

Pros:
1) Friendly Doctor
2) Minimal Scan/Tests/Medicine (My wife was only taking Folic acid, iron and Calcium tabs)
3)More focus on Normal Delivery
4)Natural remedies for certain issues (My wife had certain Hormonal Imbalance, she advised 45 min walk daily without fail, the problem was gone in just 1 month without any medicine)

Cons:
None that we came across
reply_text:

All the best in your parenthood journey.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I went to the doctor with chronic symptoms and a report of USG done 5 months back however, she immediately ordered another scan to be done in her clinic and moreover the staff did not allow me to drink water from their  dispenser  and asked me to go out and buy tender coconut water. I could not find anywhere so I told them and they simply took me to the scan room and did the scan without a full bladder! Something like this I had never witnessed. After another long wait I was called by the doctor *** *** ****** ******** ******** ** ******** I ended up spending a lot of money a** ******* ** ******* *** ******* *** *** ***** *** ****** ***** ** ***** *********** ****** ** ****** ******* ******* ********** ****** * **** ** *** ****** **** *** ******* *** ****** ******** she was in a hurry and did not listen carefully to what I said. Being a mother of a child I have had a lot of scans during pregnancy and afterwards but no one had ever asked me to go out and drink coconut water.
reply_text:
Don't forget I was your doctor during pregnancy also. If I 'ordered' a scan why did you agree to do it? Why did you pay for a repeat scan? Why did you agree for internal scan? How do we force you for scan? Do we tie you up with a rope? Coconut water is known to make bladder full within half an hour. Even my 5th standard grandmother knew that. How come an experienced mother like you doesn't know that much?
Chronic symptoms of endometriosis will show a cyst later on even if not seen in earlier scans. I explained the importance of repeat scan and because you were convinced, you agreed for another scan.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr Aparnaa diagnosed me with PCOS while I was TTC desperately for almost 6 months. She gently explained that it would take time, and that I should be relaxed as I will get alright after taking her prescribed medicines. Her medications have made me healthier and lost some weight (which was increasing due to PCOS) in the past 4 months.
I usually don't prefer going to doctors in general, but my experience with her has been more than satisfactory. She does not indulge in small talk, will talk directly - to the point. She personally takes my scans and explains whatever is captured on the screen. All I am now hoping is for a good news, hoping that her prescribed medicines do the job!
reply_text: May your positive thinking result in a good news as soon as possible. My  efforts  and best wishes are with you always.

review: I visited Dr Aparna somewhere around September 2019. My husband and myself were planning for a baby and I just went to check if my health is okay to proceed with conceiving, as I felt I was overweight. So mam suggested a few blood tests and an ultrasound. After doing so we came to know that I have ovarian cyst and that needs to be treated before we move further. She started the treatment and asked me to improve my lifestyle and reduce some weight. She gave only one medicine. And with her medicine and my changed lifestyle my condition was corrected completely in 5 months. I conceived in August 2020 and was visiting her during my pregnancy and she gave only the necessary medicines. By god's grace I had no complications during my entire pregnancy and we were blessed with a baby girl in May 2021 through normal delivery under mam's supervision at Rainbow Hospital, Bannerghatta Road. She is an expert in her field and is very confident about the treatment that she has provided me. Though she might seem to be strict but I always felt very comfortable with her. We are so thankful to her and I have recommended so many friends of mine to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I find immense pleasure while writing this review. The journey started before my wife conceived. Aparna Man helped us in conceiving the baby without any hassle. Then taking care during serious situations like bleeding, excessive vomiting and gestational diabetes toward the end. I remember my wife experiencing pain during the labour but Mam was available midnight and handled it very vigilantly and mentally supported my wife for having it a normal way. Due to excessive pain and suffering at one moment we felt that the only possible way is to have scissor, but Mam called her colleague doctor and other senior doctors who are experts at providing epidural and also with help of suction pum doctors were able to make a normal delivery possible. Thereafter we were graced with a baby boy, who was first blessed by Aparna mam itself. Aparna mam may look serious and strict sometimes in nature, but she is very friendly and frank from within. She never prescribes unnecessary medicines. Her recommended doctors were also super and helpful. She will help you all through your journey, always keep replying to queries on WhatsApp as well. Towards the end of my journey I am very happy and delighted having my little one beside me. Thanks a lot Aprna Mam. Also great thanks to Care Diagnostic and Rainbow Hospital for their friendly and caring hospitality.
reply_text: Many thanks for writing in detail. Happy parenting.

review:
My wife and myself waited for a baby over 7 years. We almost lost hope and by God's grace my wife conceived on May'21. It was a high risk pregnancy, Covid times and needed utmost care. While God gave us the good news, also ensured we get the  journey thoroughly blessed by the Almighty. That is when Supreme led us to Dr Aparna Panda. We got to know about her from Practo and without a second thought from Practo's review the care started under her guidance. Dr Aparna was not only a physician but a mentor for us with an excellent blend of sincerity, support and guidance. Starting from the phycological preparedness till every minute details of diet, health monitoring was taught to us. She is always approachable over whatsapp be it early morning or late in night. We followed Mam each step and got blessed with a baby after almost 8 years.  My wife continues to get post delivery guidance from Mam. 

Thank You Very Much Mam. Thank You Practo & Care Diagnostics. Keep Doing the Great Work for many like us :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: We visited the doctor based on recommendation as we were not aware of good gyno in bglor. Initially things were fine as we were following her instructions rigorously. However there were many issues which we faced- 1. Wait time - No need to make any early bookings cz everytime you have to wait for atleast half hour no matter whether it's morning or evening slot2. Doctor reachability - It is difficult to be in direct contact. The only nmbr shared was clinic/ doc's wasp number. I was facing severe gasteric attacks during my second trimester, I used to message her to check on the meds I can take, however there was always delay in her response upto a day. And the response I got was just 1 word - ok. She didn't even ask about my condition, if I am feeling okay or not.3. Pregnancy related - Everything was fine till 5th month, my baby growth was healthy as per Doc. However the moment we shared that we were planning to get the delvry done in our hometown, my pregnancy condition became high risk with hypertension being the reason. Not sure why for first 5 months it was not highlighted but only told when we shared our travel & delivery plansI came to my hometown, visited new gyno, got a good one thankfully who reduced my meds and also told that my pregnancy is normal, no hypertension or anything to worry about. Even my BP was constant and normal till the delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am extremely happy to say that I delivered a healthy baby boy three weeks ago and all the credit goes to Dr.Aparnaa Ma'am.My journey with Dr.Aparnaa started from the beginning of my pregnancy. The 9 months of pregnancy with Dr Aparnaa is extremely satisfying. Though I was over weight, she always encouraged for normal delivery. She doesn't prescribes any unnecessary scans or tests. She always replied to my queries whenever I messaged her in WhatsApp. I still remember the day I got admitted in hospital. I was not able to tolerate the pain and requested doctor to go for c-section . But she was very confident about the normal delivery and suggested me to go for epidural. I took epidural and my pain reduced a lot. And finally I delivered my baby normally. It was just because of Dr aparnaa ma'am that I had normal delivery. And that is the best thing that had happened to me. I was able to walk and take care of my baby just after 2 hrs of my delivery.Finally I would like to say, trust Dr.Aparnaa ma'am blindly. *** ** *** ***** Sometimes, she might scold but trust me that is for our betterment.

review:
****** ****** ***** ** *** ** *** **** ************ ** ********** We have consulted Doctor Aparna Panda for my wife’s 4th Pregnancy. Before consulting Doctor Aparna Panda we have consulted nearly 8 to 10 other gynecologists. My wife’s age is around 35 years, all three previous deliveries are normal deliveries and all are girls.
But after 3rd baby delivery, since 7 years my wife faced lot of issues during pregnancy and got abortions 3 times. We almost decided not to have any more kids. 
One of my friend suggested to consult Aparna Panda for our problems. We met Doctor Aparna and explained all of our problems. After doctor started medications, within 3 months my wife got pregnant. 
Since previously my wife had got 3 abortions, we had a lot of tension.
But doctor gave us lot of confidence, till delivery we got excellent treatment. Doctor Aparna is very co-operative, has lot of patience and clarified all our silly and minor doubts.
On 23rd October 2019 we had been blessed with a Baby Boy. This is one of the best moment in our life.
Before delivery almost 10 days, every day we have consulted doctor. We got excellent advice from her. During delivery time, doctor took special care and done normal delivery. We don’t have any words to express our thanks to doctor Aparna Panda.
Thank you once again doctor Aparna Panda!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I don't know how should I thank Dr Aparna Panda. she is like a guardian angel for us. I have been suffering from PCOD and several other hormonal issues since my teenage, was always doubtful whether I can become a mother naturally or not. After trying for some 2-3 months we thought off consulting a good gynecologist. After going through all the good reviews and as doctor Panda is available to our nearby my place, booked an appointment with her  during the time of full-fledged lockdown (july).After analysing our report, she gave us three months course of medication and asked us to meet after 3 months. Unfortunately due to our busy schedule and traveling, we couldn't complete the three months medication. But magically I got the good news exactly after 3 months and that time I was travelling to my native place and my return ticket were booked for Bangalore next week,we consulted her through video call she guided us very patiently. Finally I came back to Bangalore safely and met her personally. Now I am totally under her supervision, waiting to see our bundle of joy soon. Doctor Panda listens to all her patients very patiently, when I met a first time personally after conceiving, I was little anxious and asked her lots of questions. She answers to all my questions very patiently. Highly recommended to everyone who are looking for a good gynac for infertility issues.Thank u so much Dr. Panda , we will always be greatful to you.🙏🏼
reply_text: Thanks for patiently following my advice doing all investigations correctly and taking all medicines timely. And yes.... coming back to me with the good news......and mostly for writing in. That is what will motivate me from keep on trying to help my patients again and again and again.

review: This is our first baby and we got the good news only around wk 24 of pregnancy. We preferred to refer to one of the so called best hospital in Bangalore but it turned out to be a nightmare. There was some complications in the pregnancy and the doctor suggested delivery around wk 27. We were very depressed and tensed thinking about what next if the baby is delivered so early.Browsing Google we found Dr Aparnaa Panda and decided to take a second option about the delivery. The first visit with her was very fruitful and looking at the reports she stated that there is nothing to worry and my wife can carry the pregnancy, the visit certainly gave lot of confidence to us. Over the next few weeks every time we meet her she explained about the current state and what can be done next. 20th Nov we were blessed with a baby boy. Thanks to Dr Aparna.She is very composed, transparent about the situation and very calculative in taking risk during medical conditions. She never suggest unnecessary medicine or tests and always suggest the best possible way so that someone does not ends up spending money .I will suggest every one to refer her for issues.Thank you Dr Aparnaa again for giving the smile to us end of the day.
